the-momentum-district:
A unique community where modern living meets the natural surroundings. The apartments and villas are equipped with smart home and green energy features and complemented by commercial spaces, and in the neighbourhood you will find restaurants, recreation, entertainment and business events.

The complex has 4 types of properties for leisure, living, business and investment. They are surrounded by beautiful nature with access to 3 incredible beaches. More than 50% of the project area is taken up by common amenities.

Location: 3 minutes from Layan and Bang Tao beaches, 5 minutes from Laguna Golf club and Xana beach club, 10 minutes from Boat Avenue and Porto de Phuket, 15 minutes from the airport and Blue Tree water park.

Amenities: business hub, hotel, entertainment, wellness and gastronomic hub.

The project includes: ecological concept, premium finishes and materials.

Rental pool 70% / 30% guaranteed return programme
697102a325136-azizi-venice-16:
Azizi Venice is a unique residential complex located in the heart of Dubai, offering luxurious housing with stunning design and magnificent views of the city and ocean. This project combines modern technologies, style, and comfort, creating the perfect place for living and relaxation. With its amazing architecture and extensive amenities, Azizi Venice becomes an ideal choice for those seeking elite housing in Dubai.

Amenities:

  • Infinity rooftop pool with panoramic views
  • Fitness center with modern equipment
  • 24/7 serviced lobby
  • Spacious relaxation terraces and BBQ area

Neighborhood Infrastructure:

  • Cafes, restaurants, and shops located near the residential complex
  • Shopping centers and supermarkets a few minutes' drive away
  • Schools and nurseries within walking distance
  • Proximity to medical facilities and hospitals
  • Convenient transportation links and parking spaces
  • Adjacent to attractions and parks

Distance to Key Dubai Locations:

  • Dubai International Airport - 20 minutes
  • Jumeirah Beach - 15 minutes
  • Marina Walk - 10 minutes
  • Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall - 25 minutes

At Azizi Venice, you can enjoy a luxurious lifestyle in the heart of Dubai, surrounded by modern conveniences and developed infrastructure. This residential complex offers unique opportunities for comfortable living and excellent leisure, making it an ideal choice for those who value quality of life and high-level service.
olivia-gardens-residence:
Olivia Gardens Residence is a premium residential complex located in the prestigious Jumeirah Gardens City area. This development features a combination of modern design and high-end amenities, creating a perfect choice for those seeking luxury living in a prime location. The building consists of 23 studios, 16 large studios with separate bedrooms, 30 one-bedroom apartments, and 9 two-bedroom apartments. All apartments are designed with elegant finishes, offering a sophisticated living experience.

The residences at Olivia Gardens Residence are equipped with high-end materials and kitchen appliances, ensuring a comfortable and functional living environment. The apartments are available in various layouts, with different sizes to cater to different needs. Each unit is designed with luxury in mind, providing spacious living areas that are perfect for relaxation and entertainment. The project offers a range of modern amenities, including an infinity pool, rooftop swimming pool, gym, and a children's playground.

Olivia Gardens Residence is located in a prime area near Dubai’s business center, shopping, and cultural landmarks. The development is easily accessible, with quick access to the main highway, Sheikh Zayed Road, and the Emirates Towers and World Trade Center metro stations. The area is also home to luxurious amenities such as a BBQ area, outdoor cinema, yoga platform, and olive tree gardens with chill-out zones, providing a perfect blend of comfort and convenience.
amber-by-enso:
Amber by Enso in Jumeirah Garden City offers apartments ranging from cozy studios to expansive three-bedroom penthouses with maid rooms. The design of each residence features carefully considered details and quality finishes that support a comfortable everyday lifestyle.

Amber by Enso provides a well-rounded amenity offering for leisure and convenience, including a swimming pool, kids’ pool and water park, and BBQ lawns. Residents can stay active with both an indoor gym and an outdoor gym, or unwind in the Zen garden and meditation zone. Families will appreciate the indoor and outdoor children’s play areas, and an electric car charging station is also available on site.

Located in Jumeirah Garden City, Amber offers strong connectivity to key Dubai destinations. Sheikh Zayed Road is around a 2-minute drive away, while City Walk is approximately 5 minutes away. La Mer Beach, The Dubai Mall / Burj Khalifa, DIFC, and Emirates Towers Metro are around a 10-minute drive, and Dubai International Airport is approximately 15 minutes away.
sea-legend-one:
Sea Legend One — where the sea is your neighbor.

Life slows down here. Mornings begin with sunlight, salty air, and the sound of waves.

This is more than a place to live — it’s a lifestyle guided by nature’s rhythm.

Located on Dubai Islands, just steps from the shore and 15 minutes from Downtown Dubai,

Sea Legend One offers a rare balance of privacy and connectivity.

The architecture is inspired by the sea and sky: smooth lines, reflective surfaces, and natural textures.

Each space is filled with light, air, and a sense of calm.

The project features only 65 club-style residences — from spacious 1- to 5-bedroom apartments,

each with panoramic views and thoughtful layouts.

Amenities designed for a well-lived life:

  • Rooftop infinity pool with sea views
  • Spa area with hammam and jacuzzi
  • Children’s zone
  • Fully equipped gym
  • BBQ area and fire lounge
  • Private cinema
  • Landscaped walking paths

In the lobby: lounge seating, co-working space, and 24/7 concierge service.

Private parking with EV charging for your convenience.

Developed by MVS Development, an international real estate company with 18 years of experience in the UK and UAE.

Sea Legend One — a home that truly feels like yours.
the-grandala:
The Grandala is not just a residential project, it is an embodiment of a comfortable lifestyle. The residences exude luxury and are equipped with top-notch amenities. With shops and restaurants within walking distance, as well as in-house services such as a gym, pool, and full hotel-service, The Grandala ensures convenience at every step.

In addition to physical comfort, The Grandala goes the extra mile by offering services such as rental management through an app and room service, cleaning, and a club floor, providing uninterrupted and exclusive living for its residents.

Invest in a lifestyle, not just a home. This project is more than just a residential complex; it is a testament to the art of living. From the moment you step into our meticulously designed apartments, you will be enchanted by the impeccable blend of luxury, innovation, and convenience. The perfect combination of smart technology and luxurious living awaits you at our prestigious address in Jumeira Garden City.

The project is executed in a new Home-hotel concept, allowing you to own an apartment with full hotel services. It is located just a 5-minute walk from the park and features an outdoor pool with a city skyline view, a gym, a leisure and work club, laundry facilities, apartment cleaning, room service, and is only 5 minutes away from the metro.

Our project is strategically located in the Jumeira Garden City area, with convenient access to famous landmarks such as Sheikh Zayed Road, Downtown Dubai, Jumeira Beach, City Walk, and Bur Dubai. Moreover, it is within a few minutes' walk from the Financial Centre metro station. Situated in the heart of Dubai, the project provides proximity to the city's renowned attractions, all within a 10-minute radius.

capital-horizon-terraces:
Capital Horizon Terraces is the first project on Dubai Islands with unique apartment layouts, where Italian engineering and thoughtful design provide up to 12% more usable interior space compared to other developers.

This means that buyers are investing in net living space rather than overpaying for non-standard large balconies.

This is a complex of 63 apartments. For those who value privacy and a quiet life. The apartments feature designer finishes, are fully furnished with Miele appliances, have 3.2-meter-high ceilings, and terraces for leisure activities on the first floor.

The layouts have been designed by Italian specialists to perfectly suit the needs of Airbnb customers for short-term rentals.

Large families will feel comfortable here thanks to the convenient location of the passageways, and family members will not disturb each other during their leisure time.

Right now, Capital Horizon Terraces apartments are the most affordable properties in Dubai's new coastal area. The price per square foot of net living space is one of the best on the Dubai Islands. It is 10-15% lower than the rest.

Therefore, this offer gives investors the opportunity to acquire real estate in Dubai's most popular investment location at a lower price than other developers.

The project's convenient corner location will allow residents of the complex to enjoy unobstructed views of the marina, canal, and city.

All this will increase the liquidity of the property and increase the ROI from 7% to 9% on rent here.

Capital Horizon Terraces is something new in Dubai. This is the future. What should happen to real estate in the near future is a sensible purchase of comfort, not overpaying for a brand.

Follow 3D Tour.
colibri-views:
Colibri Views is an innovative residential project located in the heart of RAK Central, offering a vibrant lifestyle enriched with world-class amenities. This exclusive development features studio, 1-bedroom, and 2-bedroom fully furnished apartments, designed with dynamic layout options, smart convertible designs, and modular furniture concepts to maximize space and comfort. A unique highlight of Colibri Views is its partnership with global football icon Patrice Evra, who brings his passion for performance to the community with the exclusive Footbot—an advanced football simulator designed to elevate your training experience.

Residents can enjoy an impressive range of amenities such as a serene Japanese garden, sky observatory deck, infinity swimming pool, jacuzzi, aquatic and indoor/outdoor gyms, as well as specialized wellness facilities including a spa, beauty salon, and clinic. The project encourages an active and social lifestyle with features like outdoor library seating, event and party areas, BBQ zones, a cigar lounge, co-working spaces, yoga and Zumba decks, trampoline, table tennis, chess, and dedicated kids’ play and pool areas. Additional thoughtful perks include cabana seating and a prayer room, ensuring comfort and convenience for all residents. Colibri Views is where modern living meets dynamic design and vibrant community spirit.

This debut development by Dia in Dubai combines elegant design with cutting-edge smart-home features, including fingerprint access and EV charging stations. Residents can enjoy premium amenities like a fitness center, swimming pool, golf carts, and a stylish lobby. The complex offers 1–2 and 4 bedroom apartments with neutral-tone interiors, panoramic windows, and optional full furnishing. Located just 5 minutes from the beach and close to Deira Mall and golf clubs, Luz Ora promises high investment potential.

AMENITIES

verde-by-vision:
Introducing Verde by Vision — a stunning new luxury residential tower rising in the heart of Dubai Sports City, a vibrant and well-connected community renowned for its active lifestyle and urban convenience.

Designed with contemporary elegance and functionality, the tower comprises a basement, ground floor, 16 upper levels, and a rooftop. Four high-speed elevators ensure smooth and efficient access, while each apartment is thoughtfully designed to maximize space, natural light, and comfort.

All residences come fully equipped with premium Teka kitchen appliances, reflecting the project’s commitment to high-quality finishes and modern living. The interiors blend style and practicality, making them ideal for both homeowners and investors.

Residents will enjoy a wide range of premium lifestyle amenities, including:

  • A serene swimming pool
  • A fully equipped fitness center
  • A dedicated kids’ play area
  • Private cinema and gaming room
  • A tranquil yoga and wellness space
  • Outdoor BBQ and relaxation zones
  • An elegant party hall for social gatherings

Together, these features foster a sense of community, balance, and active urban living — where comfort, connection, and convenience come together seamlessly.

Strategically located in Dubai Sports City, Verde by Vision offers easy access to major highways, business districts, educational institutions, and leisure destinations. More than just a place to live, it’s a place to thrive — where you can enjoy a high quality of life, make smart investments, and embrace the future in one of Dubai’s most promising communities.

Verde by Vision — where modern design meets vibrant living.
artistry-residences-2:
Artistry Two Residences is a 37-storey residential tower by Select Group, located in Dubai Design District (d3). The concept is centred on transparency and light, with architecture designed around balanced proportions and fluid movement, while keeping a sense of privacy and calm inside the building.

The tower comprises one-, two- and three-bedroom residences, alongside four-bedroom duplex penthouses on the upper levels. Apartment sizes range from 738 to 1,988 sq ft depending on layout, while duplex penthouses range from 4,639 to 7,767 sq ft and may include private plunge pools and rooftop terraces in selected signature homes.

Amenities are organised across lifestyle levels. Social and work-focused spaces include a residents’ lounge, co-working area and a multipurpose room, supported by family and recreation elements such as a kids play area, padel court, family lawn and pavilion, and an outdoor gaming area. Pool facilities include a horizon pool and kids pool, while the 22nd floor adds an infinity lap pool and a dedicated wellness and fitness suite with gym, private training studio, sauna, steam room and ice baths.
the-residences-at-sheraton-al-marjan-isl:
Atara Development introduces The Residences at Sheraton Al Marjan Island Resort, the GCC’s first Sheraton-branded residences and part of an exclusive collection of just five homes worldwide to date. Designed with meticulous precision, these residences blend contemporary architecture with Sheraton’s storied heritage, set against the tranquil backdrop of Al Marjan Island.

Blending coastal living with the heritage of a trusted brand. The Residences delivers a sense of belonging and prestige.

  • Private beach access
  • Panoramic sea & island views from the residences
  • Co-located with Sheraton Al Marjan Island Resort
  • Fully-furnished & serviced residences
  • Sheraton’s global service culture at your doorstep
  • Access to Sheraton’s signature & community-focused amenities
golf-terrace:
Golf Terrace Residences by ASAK Real Estate Development is located in Dubai Production City and represents a modern residential complex that combines stylish design with convenient layouts. The project includes studios, as well as one and two-bedroom apartments, creating comfortable living conditions for both families and young professionals. With thoughtful architecture and integration of modern technologies, Golf Terrace provides a harmonious blend of urban dynamics and a peaceful atmosphere.

Life at Golf Terrace is built around a comfortable infrastructure focused on an active lifestyle and relaxation. The complex offers swimming pools, a fitness area, spaces for yoga and meditation, children’s playgrounds, walking and jogging tracks, as well as communal areas for socializing and meetings. This range of amenities makes the project convenient for daily living and supports a high quality of life for residents of all ages.

The project is advantageously located with good transport accessibility: key highways of Dubai are nearby, providing quick access to business districts, shopping centers, and major city points. Golf Terrace is also attractive as an investment property due to the stable rental demand in Dubai Production City and the area’s growth prospects, making it a compelling choice for both personal residence and investment.
the-collection-residences:
A landmark residential development set in the very heart of Limassol’s historic center—just steps from Anexartisias Fashion Street and moments from the Old Port and Limassol Marina and just 600 meters distance to the seafront. 

This project redefines city living and presents what is arguably the most attractive real estate investment opportunity in central Limassol today.

Comprising 70 contemporary studio, 1-, and 2-bedroom apartments, each unit has been intelligently designed to cater to the demands of today’s urban lifestyle, offering functional layouts, modern aesthetics, and high-quality finishes and exceptional return on investment.
lennox-residences:
A new contemporary project . 

Modern design including a large communal pool in one of Limassol’s most desirable suburbs.
noa-residences:
This new residential complex is located in Mesa Geitonia, Limassol—one of the city's most convenient and sought-after areas. The project features a contemporary architectural style with an emphasis on quality construction, functionality, and comfort, making it an excellent choice for both personal residence and investment.

The complex offers thoughtful layouts and high-quality finishes: bright living spaces, modern kitchens with elegant cabinets and practical countertops, and stylish bathrooms with modern fixtures. High-quality laminate flooring is featured in the living areas and bedrooms, while European-made ceramic tiles are used in the bathrooms and verandas.

The building is equipped with double-glazed thermal aluminum windows, providing high levels of thermal and acoustic insulation. Preparations are made for air conditioning and underfloor heating. For additional comfort and security, the complex is equipped with a video intercom and modern access control systems. Each apartment includes a covered parking space and a storage room.

Situated in JVC, Amaris Tower benefits from convenient access to major road networks and key areas of Dubai, while maintaining a calm and residential atmosphere.

casa-altia:
Casa Altia — where elevated living is expressed at every level. This refined residential project combines thoughtful vertical organization and premium amenities to create a distinctive urban sanctuary. 

The podium hosts practical parking and The Galleria, an elegant communal spine that connects daily life with curated services. The ground plane features Casa Azul, a welcoming single-story element that anchors the development. 

Each level designed for comfort and privacy, culminating in rooftop amenities that offer panoramic views and leisure spaces for residents. 

Living here means more than owning a home. It means experiencing a collection of spaces that elevate the everybody. From moments of relaxation to energizing routines and inspiring work settings every area is designed with purpose.

Thoughtful planning maximizes daylight, circulation and connection to communal spaces, while the composition of podium, mid-rise residences and rooftop amenities provides a layered living experience that balances urban convenience with elevated tranquility. Casa Altia embodies contemporary comfort, refined proportions and a clear hierarchy of spaces designed for modern family life.
binghatti-etherea: Binghatti Etherea redefines urban living in JVC through architectural poetry and mindful design. Its signature exoskeleton, a fusion of satin-chrome fins and sleek glass, creates a dynamic silhouette that narrows skyward, amplifying natural light while providing intelligent solar shading. By day, the tower breathes with the desert sun; by night, it transforms into a luminous landmark glowing against Dubai's skyline. Beyond aesthetics, Etherea champions sustainable luxury: energy-efficient systems, responsibly sourced materials, and wellness-integrated amenities, from yoga platforms to shaded social nooks, cultivate a sanctuary where pace is personal. Open-plan residences in muted palettes maximize daylight and spatial serenity, while the development's strategic JVC location bridges tranquillity with connectivity. Etherea isn't merely a residence; it's a conscious choice for those seeking grounded elegance without compromising on modern convenience, a place where every detail, from structural crown to bespoke finishes, serves the art of intentional living.
noore:
Nooré was envisioned to elevate the way we live, feel, and connect through light. At Nooré, light is not just seen - it is felt.It moves with intention, softens form, and infuses every space with warmth and serenity. Each detail is thoughtfully curated to invite natural light, enhance comfort, and nurture well-being.

With wellness-driven architecture and refined finishes, Nooré offers more than a home - it offers a luminous living experience.

Located in the heart of Dubai's visionary Meydan District, Nooré places you just steps from the world-renowned Dubai World Cup - one of the most prestigious equestrian venues in the world. Here, refined living flows effortlessly - framed by open landscapes, seamless connectivity, and a masterplan shaped for elegance, privacy, and prestige.
serenz-by-danube: Serenz by Danube redefines luxury living in Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC) with its stunning new launch of fully furnished residences. Strategically located just 2 minutes from Al Khail Road (E44) and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311), this development offers seamless connectivity to Dubai’s key destinations. The project features a resort-inspired lifestyle with over 40 world-class amenities, including an infinity pool with panoramic city views, lush landscaped gardens, and vibrant communal spaces. Designed for both investors and end-users, Serenz provides meticulously crafted studios, 1–3 BHK apartments with flexible configurations, starting from AED 840,000. Premium finishes, floor-to-ceiling glazing, and smart home systems elevate every residence, while the iconic curved architecture ensures privacy and natural light. With EOI and bookings now open, early confirmation is highly recommended due to limited launch inventory. Experience a harmonious blend of elegance, convenience, and tranquility in one of Dubai’s most dynamic neighborhoods.
joud-tower:
Joud Tower in Sharjah rises in the sought-after waterfront community of Al Mamzar, offering residents a serene setting framed by the picturesque Al Mamzar and Al Khan lakes. Despite its tranquil atmosphere, the tower maintains excellent connectivity to major highways, placing key destinations such as Dubai International Airport, Sharjah Corniche, and Dubai Islands within easy reach. Business hubs, cultural landmarks, shopping districts, and urban attractions are all conveniently accessible.

Developed by Al Batha Real Estate, Joud Tower is designed for those seeking a comfortable, contemporary home complemented by calming lake views. Its elegant, minimalist architecture houses bright, open living spaces equipped with smart home features. Catering to families, professionals, and investors alike, the tower combines spacious layouts, peaceful living, and lasting value in a single landmark address.

A variety of residential options are available, ranging from two to four-bedroom apartments, duplex units, and an exclusive penthouse. Each residence features large windows that flood the interiors with natural light, high-quality finishes, and thoughtfully designed layouts for everyday comfort. The tower also includes over 20,000 square feet of retail space at ground level and dedicates seven floors to parking. Security is enhanced with smart access systems, while round-the-clock concierge and on-site maintenance services ensure both convenience and prompt support for all residents.
697b5158882f3-jw-marriott-residences: JW Marriott Residences at Dubai Islands presents an exclusive collection of waterfront homes where refined luxury meets the rhythm of the Arabian Gulf. Perched between Dubai's vibrant skyline and serene azure waters, these residences offer private terraces that blur the boundary between indoor elegance and the marina lifestyle beyond. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame ever-changing seascapes of golden sunsets and crystalline horizons, while bespoke interiors feature premium finishes, double-glazed serenity, and seamless flow for sophisticated living. As part of Dubai Islands a cornerstone of Vision 2040 residents enjoy privileged access to Blue Flag beaches, the Dubai Islands Mall, and the exclusive Sports Country Club. Backed by the globally revered JW Marriott legacy of hospitality excellence, this address redefines coastal living for those who seek distinction without compromise. Where every dawn brings renewal and every evening, tranquility.
binghatti-luxuria:
Binghatti Luxuria is a high-rise residential development by Binghatti in Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT), District 9. The building is planned with a 3B + G + 4P + 24-floor configuration and a plot area of 3,131.72 sq m, combining residential floors with a dedicated retail layer for everyday convenience, services, and dining.

The residential collection includes studios, 1-bedroom, and 2-bedroom residences, plus a limited number of 2-bedroom Royale Suites. In total, the project features 457 residential units and 12 retail units, with an estimated 14 to 20 homes per floor. Apartment sizes are positioned in compact-to-spacious ranges, from studio layouts to larger 2-bedroom formats.

Amenities are designed around active living and family routines, with an adult pool, kids pool, gym, basketball court, jacuzzi, an aerobics platform, seating areas, and a children’s play area. Located within JVT, the project is suited to a calm community setting with day-to-day services close by and practical connectivity across Dubai.
arthouse-hills-arjan:
Arthouse Hills sets a new standard for branded living in Arjan. The tower’s floor-to-ceiling glazing maximizes daylight and frame sun interrupted views of garden sand the skyline. Its clean geometry,guided by subtle Japanese references, establishes a rhythm of balance and calm.

Residences are delivered fully furnished, integrating smart home systems with finely crafted finishes that merge comfort with design discipline.

Key Highlights:

  • Furnished homes with TOTO fittings
  • Floor-to-ceiling glass for light & views
  • Open layouts with glass balconies to maximize views
  • Designer kitchens with European appliances

Amenities:

  • Rooftop infinity pool
  • Family pool and kids pool
  • Outdoor & indoor kids play area
  • Forest area
  • Water park
  • Games Room
  • Exclusive Cigar Lounge
  • Resident’s Library
  • Japanese Zen Garden
  • State-Of-The-Art Fitness Studio
  • Sauna & Cold Plunge
  • Sound Healing
naafi-residences: Centrally positioned within Limassol’s urban core,vFrinis Street offers effortless access to the city’s cultural, business and leisure destinations. The surrounding neighbourhoods combine a residential character with proximity to cafés, dining and boutique shops, all within walking distance, while the seafront promenade and Old Town are only a few minutes’ driving distance away.
barari-palace: Welcome to Barari Palace — a statement of elegance, a sanctuary of calm, and a modern architectural landmark rising at the edge of Al Barari’s iconic greenery. Designed for those who seek more than just luxury, Barari Palace offers a lifestyle defined by clarity, comfort, and quiet sophistication. Here, cooler air flows through lush landscapes, and every architectural detail reflects uncompromised design philosophy. This is not merely a residence; it is a personal realm where power meets peace — a place where the city fades away the moment you cross the threshold. Crafted for the modern connoisseur, Barari Palace blends natural materials, warm tones, and soft lighting to create spaces that feel both refined and deeply inviting. From grand entrances shaped by openness and light to private retreats designed for unwinding, every element speaks of intention and timeless beauty. Located in Majan, one of Dubai’s most serene and refreshing environments, Barari Palace places you minutes from the city’s major attractions while offering a world apart from its noise. It is more than a home — it is a beginning designed with purpose, where every day starts with intention and ends with ease.
rosario: Rosario Residence is a boutique development set in a quiet cul-de-sac in Kato Polemidia, offering future residents privacy and peace just a minute from highway access. Its location combines daily convenience with excellent connectivity to the rest of Limassol. The project is being developed with carefully selected, high-quality materials, and benefits from the developer’s long-standing collaboration with trusted local teams, promising durable construction, thoughtful design, and long-term value.
project-maybach:
Project Maybach is a residential and retail building by Binghatti, planned within Mercedes-Benz Places | Binghatti City in Meydan, Dubai. The project is designed as a structured high-rise with Basement, Ground Floor, Mezzanine, 5 parking floors, 24 residential floors, mechanical floors, and a roof level, set on a plot area of 8,763.69 sq.m.

The residence mix includes 816 homes in total, with 608 studios, 76 one-bedroom residences, 92 two-bedroom residences, and 40 three-bedroom residences. Daily convenience is supported by 15 retail shops on the ground floor, creating a clear live-and-access format where residential spaces and essential services sit within one address.

As part of the wider Mercedes-Benz Places | Binghatti City concept, Project Maybach follows the district’s architectural identity shaped around clean geometry and an organized city-scale vision. The location in Meydan places the project within reach of key Dubai destinations, while the broader masterplan integrates lifestyle and retail functions that support an active city rhythm beyond the tower itself.
maybach-ultimate-luxury:
Vision Mercedes-Maybach Ultimate Luxury is a multi-building residential and retail component planned within Mercedes-Benz Places Binghatti City in Meydan, Dubai, developed by Binghatti Developers. The concept follows the wider Mercedes-Benz design identity, expressed through clean geometry and a structured, city-scale approach, while Ultimate Luxury represents a dedicated part of the overall destination rather than the full cluster.

The development combines residential living with retail at ground level. The project is arranged across basement, ground floor, mezzanine, five parking floors, 19 residential floors, 24 residential floors, mechanical floors, and a roof level. The residential collection includes Studio, 1 BR, 2 BR, and 3 BR apartments, with a total of 1,204 residences.

The unit mix is structured as 864 Studio, 140 1 BR, 140 2 BR, and 60 3 BR residences. Retail is integrated on the ground floor through 28 shops, supporting a more complete day-to-day lifestyle inside the community and strengthening the project’s residential and retail positioning within Mercedes-Benz Places Binghatti City.
aristo:
Welcome to Aristo – OKSA Developer’s latest architectural masterpiece in the heart of Dubai South. This contemporary G+4 residential building redefines modern living with 66 meticulously designed units that blend elegance, functionality, and comfort. Aristo represents a perfect harmony of sophisticated design and strategic location, offering residents an unparalleled lifestyle in one of Dubai’s most dynamic and fastest-growing communities.

Strategically positioned in Dubai South, Aristo provides seamless connectivity to Al Maktoum International Airport, Expo City Dubai, and major business hubs, making it an ideal choice for professionals, families, and investors seeking premium living with exceptional convenience. The development showcases OKSA Developer’s commitment to delivering quality homes that exceed expectations while maintaining competitive pricing in the market.

With its modern façade, thoughtfully planned layouts, and world-class amenities, Aristo is designed for those who appreciate the finer things in life. Each residence is crafted with attention to detail, featuring contemporary finishes, equipped kitchens, and optimal space utilization. Whether you’re a first-time homebuyer, a growing family, or a savvy investor, Aristo offers the perfect foundation for your Dubai dream.
kleri-residence: A luxury block of apartments consisting of two and three bedroom apartments at Kato Polemidia area. Each apartment has it' s own storage room and parking space
sanctuary:
Sanctuary by Prestige One is a 24-storey residential building planned in Meydan, within Ras Al Khor Industrial Area 1, Dubai. The concept is shaped around calm, nature-inspired living, designed as a boutique-style vertical community with landscaped terraces and skyline-oriented views.

The residences are planned to support comfortable everyday living, with layouts that emphasize privacy, natural light, and functional zoning. The project is positioned as a focused residential setting within a well-connected part of Dubai.

Lifestyle is supported by two dedicated amenity levels. Level 9 features a sunken island-style pool with a waterfall element, kids water features, a kids pool, outdoor fitness, a serenity garden, an observation deck, picnic spaces, and an outdoor cinema. Level 21 offers a skylight infinity pool, jacuzzi, outdoor relaxation areas, a BBQ zone, and lounge seating surrounded by greenery, with convenient access across key Dubai destinations.
nova:
Nova is a space where every detail is created for comfort, tranquility, and aesthetic pleasure. A place that inspires you to live beautifully and enjoy every day.

Located in one of Limassol’s most desirable neighborhoods. Shops, schools, cafés, and the beach are all within walking distance. The perfect balance between privacy and city convenience.
artistry-residences:
Artistry One Residences by Select Group is a residential tower in Dubai Design District (d3), designed as a high-rise of around 36 floors with an approximate height of 151.9 m. The project is shaped around a contemporary urban lifestyle, with a strong focus on resident privacy, building security, and a location that connects smoothly to major destinations across Dubai.

The residence collection includes 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, 3-bedroom apartments and a limited selection of 4-bedroom duplex penthouses. Ceiling heights are set at 3 m for 1–3 bedroom homes and 4 m for penthouses, creating a clean, spacious feel across the layouts. Selected 2-bedroom homes and all 3-bedroom residences include a maid’s room, while parking allocation is planned as 1 space for 1–2 bedroom units and 2 spaces for 3-bedroom homes and penthouses.

Interiors follow a structured material palette: porcelain tiles across key areas, with timber and porcelain tile flooring in penthouses. Kitchens feature recon tile countertops and timber cabinetry, while bathrooms are finished with porcelain tiling, brushed nickel details, tempered glass, and plain mirrors. Appliances for 1–3 bedroom units are specified as Teka (gas oven, built-in hob, fridge freezer, hood), while penthouses include both a main and grease kitchen, with Teka back-of-house and Miele front-of-house appliances, including a wine cooler and coffee machine. Amenities include lobby and reception areas, concierge services, two horizon pools on the 1st and 22nd floors with sun decks, residents’ lounge, family and kids areas, sauna, ice bath and steam room, outdoor fitness zones, a fully equipped gym, and a private training studio.
limassol-view-suites:
This small block of four different 2-bedroom units in Limassol, has all the features that make it an ideal investment real estate.

The property is located in a quiet residential neighbourhood in Germasogeia, one of the prime areas in Limassol, only 2km from the nearest organized sandy beach. All everyday amenities from banks and supermarkets to shops and restaurants are less than 1km from the property. In addition, easy access to the highway makes it an ideal base for commuters or regular travellers, as it is midway between the two airports in Larnaca and Pafos, both around 50km away.

The 3-storey block is marked by its contemporary, simple lines and houses 2 duplexes across the ground and first floor, each with 2 ensuite bedrooms and an open-plan living area. The third unit is on the first floor, while the fourth unit is the penthouse on the second floor, with its vast uncovered veranda. As such, the property offers a variety of 2-bedroom configurations to suit different purposes and preferences.

Every aspect of design, construction and finishing is geared towards comfort in an urban Mediterranean environment: Elegant entrance lobby, bright interiors, cool superior finishing materials, double glazed windows, ample fitted kitchen cabinets and appliances as well as bedroom wardrobes. Solar heating and split unit air-conditioning are also fully installed. For each unit there is a designated underground parking space, and the building provides an additional ground floor parking spot for the disabled. A communal roof terrace on the third floor offers residents a place to meet and enjoy the uninterrupted sea view, and a cool escape for evenings under the stars.

Seen as a whole, this is an investment proposition with vast potential. Whether for own use for an extended family, or for short- or long-term rental revenue, Easymal will appeal to both the local and expatriate market. It is particularly recommended for buyers seeking eligibility for the residency by investment scheme.
amande-residence:
Situated in the peaceful suburb of Erimi, Limassol, this contemporary residential development offers a refined blend of modern comfort and elegant

simplicity. Designed with a focus on quality living and functionality, the project features two beautifully crafted low-rise buildings, each comprising six

thoughtfully arranged apartments across two floors. Surrounded by a serene landscape while remaining just a short drive from Limassol’s city centre

and coastline, this development provides an ideal setting for families, professionals, and investors seeking a balanced lifestyle.

Each floor hosts two spacious two-bedroom apartments and one three-bedroom apartment, all designed with bright, open-plan interiors and generous

verandas that embrace natural light throughout the day. The top-floor three-bedroom apartments elevate the experience further, offering private roof

gardens complete with an additional bathroom, storage space, and provisions for a jacuzzi, creating a personal retreat with panoramic views.

Every residence has been carefully planned to meet modern standards of convenience and sustainability, with provisions for air conditioning and

photovoltaic panels, ensuring energy efficiency and year-round comfort. In addition, each apartment benefits from a dedicated parking space and a

private storage room, adding practical value to everyday living.

Combining thoughtful design, energy-conscious features, and a peaceful yet accessible location, this development in Erimi redefines suburban living in

Limassol – offering a perfect balance between tranquillity, modern elegance, and connectivity.
bluebell:
Bluebell Apartments, located in the heart of Limassol, present a sophisticated residential offering consisting of two elegant three-storey buildings and a detached house. These properties are situated on either side of a quiet road in a serene neighborhood, blending modern architecture with thoughtful design to ensure both aesthetic appeal and privacy for each unit. The development is carefully oriented to maximize natural light and comfort, creating a tranquil environment for residents.

Block B features a diverse selection of homes, including a one-bedroom apartment, a three-bedroom apartment, ten two-bedroom apartments with various interior layouts, and a charming two-bedroom detached villa with a spacious private garden. Each unit is generously proportioned, emphasizing comfort and functionality. Residents of Block B enjoy exclusive access to a rooftop swimming pool, offering a serene retreat with sweeping views. The interiors are thoughtfully designed with high-quality finishes, including built-in wardrobes, laminate flooring in bedrooms, and European-standard sanitary ware, complemented by practical features such as double-glazed windows, solar water heating, and an intercom system for secure entry.

The location of Bluebell Apartments is unparalleled, offering a harmonious blend of urban convenience and suburban tranquility. Situated just a short drive from Limassol’s bustling city center, the property is within easy reach of the island’s major highway system, connecting residents to other cities and attractions. The area’s amenities include a shopping center, local schools, ship management offices, and prominent businesses. Additionally, major landmarks such as Limassol Marina, the commercial port, the city’s largest mall, and the forthcoming City of Dreams Mediterranean casino resort are all conveniently close by.

This prime location makes Bluebell Apartments an excellent choice for both local and international residents seeking long-term living solutions. The combination of accessibility, privacy, and quality design ensures a high standard of living in one of Limassol’s most desirable neighborhoods. Whether as a permanent residence or an investment opportunity, Bluebell Apartments deliver unparalleled value and lifestyle benefits.

Note: Velment acts as the legal representative on behalf of the property owner.
bararigate-by-ade:
Barari Gate by ADE is a residential development in Majan, Wadi Al Safa 3, Dubai, designed as a modern mid-rise with a Ground + Podium + 10 floors + Roof configuration. The project combines private living with an active community setting, bringing together clean architectural lines and a lifestyle-led approach that prioritizes comfort, light, and everyday functionality.

The residence offers a mix of studios, 1-bedroom apartments, and 2-bedroom and 3-bedroom layouts with maid’s rooms, including variants with private pools in selected plans. Interior spaces are shaped around practical zoning, with kitchens planned for daily use, bedrooms focused on privacy and calm, and bathrooms finished in a restrained, contemporary palette. A smart home system supports home routines through controls for lighting, climate, security functions, and curtains.

Amenities are organized around wellness, sport, and family time, including an infinity pool and kids’ pool, indoor and outdoor gyms, a yoga area, sauna and jacuzzi, plus a padel court, basketball court, and dedicated running and cycling tracks. Social spaces include a business center, indoor and outdoor common areas, billiards and table tennis zones, as well as children’s play areas indoors and outdoors. Retail shops on-site add daily convenience, while the Majan address connects the community to key Dubai destinations such as Downtown Dubai, Dubai International Airport, Global Village, IMG Worlds of Adventure, and Dubai Hills Mall.
siena:
Discover the perfect blend of elegance, minimalism, and sustainability at Siena Residences, a stunning apartment complex 17 exclusive apartments. Crafted with modern aesthetics in mind, Siena Residences showcases sleek lines, sophisticated color palettes, and high-quality materials that exude a sense of contemporary luxury. The unique elevated location provides 180° panoramic views of both the sea and the mountains.

All 17 apartments are powered by a state-of-the-art photovoltaic system and the entire building will be Energy Class A certified.

Nestled in the serene charm of Germasogeia, Siena Residences offers an ideal lifestyle for those who are looking for a quietneighbourhood, while being in the city. A quick 3-minute drive provides seamless access to the highway, while a wealth of amenities—schools, supermarkets, delightful restaurants, and pristine beaches—are all just 10 minutes away.

Siena Residences offers more than just a home. It combines modern design, sustainable living, and a location which brings the best out of the city of Limassol.
haus-of-tenet:
Haus of Tenet is a fully commercial, premium-grade office development located in Dubai’s Business Bay district. As IRTH’s first fully branded project, it represents a shift toward authorship-driven development, where architecture, art, and purpose converge. Conceived at the intersection of commerce and culture, the building redefines the modern office as a symbol of legacy, influence, and long-term value rather than a purely functional workspace.

The development comprises 15 office floors and approximately 225 individual office units organized through an innovative cluster system. Each cluster is accessed via a private lobby, offering discretion, flexibility, and a semi-private arrival experience. Offices are delivered in shell & core condition, featuring full-height windows and adaptable layouts that allow businesses to scale and evolve within a single address.

A defining feature of Haus of Tenet is its art-led identity and curated amenities offering. Approximately 60,000 sq. ft. is dedicated to wellness facilities, members’ lounges, dining spaces, and shared environments. Art is embedded as a form of equity, with owners benefiting from a professionally curated collection displayed throughout the building. Designed for business leaders, family offices, and forward-thinking enterprises, Haus of Tenet offers a rare blend of commercial performance, cultural capital, and architectural distinction.
09-life-residences:
09 Life Residences is a place where everyday living becomes extraordinary. Located in the vibrant heart of Dubai Land,09 Life Residences redefines contemporary urban living through a seamless fusion of thoughtful architecture, intelligent design, and everyday comfort. Crafted for modern families and discerning investors alike, the project offers a curated collection of1- to 4-bedroom apartments, each designed to maximize space, natural light, and functional convenience. 

Expansive glass façades, flowing balcony lines, and premium finishes reflect a refined aesthetic whereform meets function—and every detail serves a purpose. Residents enjoy the benefits of afully furnished smart-home environment, elevated privacy through a dedicated podium level, and effortless access to Dubai’s key destinations—schools, leisure hubs, and major road networks—all just moments away. At 09 Life Residences, life isn’t just lived—it’s truly experienced.
greencrest:
Discover Greencrest at Dubai Hills Estate, a haven where architecture breathes with nature and every day feels like a fresh beginning. Framed by the emerald greens of the golf course and outdoors this peaceful community unfolds in calm reflection. More than architecture, Greencrest embodies poise— a lifestyle rooted in wellness and belonging. A living landmark of form and feeling that is crafted for those who see life as art and home as a sanctuary of possibility.

Wake up to sunlight over the rolling greens of Dubai Hills Golf Course and step into a retreat of calm. Every space is designed to nourish your mind, body, and spirit – encouraging mindful moments and restful pauses. Life here flows with balance and serenity. At Greencrest, wellness is the way you live.

Step outside and discover a neighbourhood built for connection and wellbeing. Curated social spaces and peaceful terraces encourage shared moments, laughter, and meaningful interactions. Greencrest is a lifestyle where balance, vitality, and a sense of harmony come naturally, every single day.

Greencrest redefines what it means to come home. Every space is infused with light, balance, and natural harmony — crafted for wellness, designed for ease. Here, modern life flows gently, surrounded by golf course views and moments of quiet joy.
evelyn:
Evelyn is a new residential development by Nshama, located in the rapidly growing community of Town Square Dubai. The project is designed for comfortable urban living, focusing on functionality, modern layouts, and well-balanced community infrastructure.

The development features thoughtfully designed apartments with panoramic windows that fill the living spaces with natural light. Evelyn’s contemporary architecture is defined by clean lines and a calm color palette, seamlessly aligning with the overall vision of the Town Square community.

Residents of Evelyn enjoy access to landscaped outdoor areas, green spaces, walking paths, and leisure zones, as well as close proximity to Town Square’s key amenities, including parks, retail outlets, cafés, schools, and sports facilities. The project is well suited for both end-users and investors.
east:
Serenia District East Residences by Palma Developments is a masterfully crafted residential sanctuary nestled on the tranquil shores of Jumeirah Islands, Dubai. Spanning 600,000 sq.ft. of thoughtfully designed space, this exclusive community comprises six elegant towers, a signature Serenia Clubhouse, and lush landscaped gardens that blur the line between architecture and nature.
Designed for modern living without compromise, the residences range from refined 1-bedroom apartments to expansive 4-bedroom penthouses (800–14,000 sq.ft.), each featuring intelligent layouts, premium finishes, and panoramic views of serene waterways and greenery. Every detail—from floor-to-ceiling windows to seamless indoor-outdoor flow—is curated to enhance light, ventilation, and spatial harmony.
Beyond aesthetics, Serenia District East offers a complete lifestyle: secure, green, and connected. Residents enjoy world-class amenities, including a state-of-the-art gym, resort-style pool, children’s play zones, BBQ areas, and 24/7 security—all within a peaceful island setting just minutes from Dubai’s key business and leisure hubs.
With freehold ownership available to all nationalities, transparent payment plans starting from AED 1.78M, and handover on the horizon, Serenia District East Residences represents a rare opportunity to own a home where luxury, tranquility, and urban convenience exist in perfect balance.
city-walk-crestlane-5: City Walk Crestlane 5 is part of a premium residential community in the heart of Dubai that fuses vibrant urban living with peaceful waterside ambience. Thoughtfully masterplanned as an integrated neighborhood, Crestlane features contemporary architecture, flowing water elements and lush landscaping so every building faces the water and every home enjoys natural light, movement and visual connection. The development offers a curated range of 1–4 bedroom apartments and duplexes with elegant layouts, premium finishes, expansive terraces and views of water, parks and the Dubai skyline. Residents benefit from seamless access to Downtown Dubai, Jumeirah Beach and major highways, while enjoying world-class amenities: swimming pools, fitness and yoga studios, sports courts, community lounges, collaborative workspaces and family play areas. City Walk Crestlane 5 delivers refined, contemporary urban living at an iconic Dubai address, balancing energetic city access with tranquil, waterside refinement.
ab-hills:
AB Hills is a contemporary residential development by AB Developers, located in the emerging Jebel Ali Hills community in Dubai. The project offers a curated collection of stylish apartments with efficient layouts and modern finishes, designed for comfortable everyday living for both homeowners and investors. Its strategic location provides easy access to major roads and key city destinations.

Living at AB Hills blends serene surroundings with urban convenience. Residents will enjoy landscaped communal spaces, a swimming pool, fitness facilities, children’s play areas, and retail amenities within the development. The project focuses on creating a vibrant lifestyle environment where comfort and convenience come together.

The Jebel Ali Hills area continues to grow as a promising residential and investment district, with proximity to transport links, shopping destinations, and future community enhancements. This positions AB Hills as an attractive opportunity for buyers seeking quality living spaces with strong long-term potential.

Payment Plan 50/50
citywalk-crestlane-4:
City Walk Crestlane is a premium residential destination in the heart of Dubai, where vibrant city living meets the calm of waterside serenity. Designed as a fully integrated community, the project blends contemporary architecture, flowing water features, and lush landscapes to create a refined urban lifestyle experience. Every building is oriented towards the water, making it a defining element of daily life and a constant source of movement, light, and connection.

Located within the iconic City Walk district, Crestlane offers seamless access to Downtown Dubai, Jumeirah Beach, and the city’s major highways. Residents enjoy a wide range of world-class amenities, including swimming pools, fitness and yoga studios, sports courts, community lounges, collaborative workspaces, and family-friendly play areas. The collection of 1- to 4-bedroom apartments and duplexes features elegant layouts, premium finishes, expansive terraces, and views of water, parks, and the city skyline. City Walk Crestlane represents a new chapter of sophisticated urban living at a truly iconic address.
vista-ridge:
Set amidst unspoiled nature with breathtaking views of green landscapes, this refined living experience on a championship golf course embodies the perfect balance of discreet luxury and a world-class golfing lifestyle.

In harmony with the natural environment, Vista Ridge offers a lifestyle shaped by the essential elements of the game, revealing a new experience each time you play. Here, the soul of golf resides; players walk, immerse, and connect with the course. And at day’s end, a warm sense of community embraces you, completing a life defined by serenity and effortless elegance.

Here, nature becomes part of everyday life. Beautiful green landscapes, peaceful gardens, and open skies create a lifestyle of calm, wellness and inspiration at every turn.

Choose how you want to spend your time, the moments you explore, and the memories you make here will last a lifetime. From an array of exhilarating outdoor adventures to calming spots, every experience is designed to enrich your days.
grove-ridge:
Tucked within Emaar South, life unfolds softly here - families grow, neighbors turn into friends, and every day feels purposefully lived. Framed by golf greens, open skies, and space to unwind, it’s not just a destination, but a feeling of belonging from the moment you arrive.

From a world-class 18-hole championship golf course to picturesque fairways, experience a daily dose of natural beauty, challenge, and adventure. Here, in Grove Ridge, leisure, sporting life and healthful pursuits come together amidst gardens and greens. A retreat from the city’s pace, the community offers a lifestyle of calm and clarity. Surrounded by greenery and open space, residents find balance, mindfulness, and a quiet sense of wellbeing woven into daily life.

A community where every day moves at your pace, energizing when you seek momentum, calming when you crave stillness. From exhilarating moments that spark your active side to serene spaces that let you unwind, life at Golf Ridge is an invitation to live beautifully, balance effortlessly, and feel your best in every moment. Every day unfolds like a story waiting to be lived. Move freely - on the golf course, in yoga flows, or through open green spaces. Here, life moves, inspires, and embraces you at every turn.
aura-prestige:
Aura Prestige redefines luxury living at the crossroads of Dubai’s most dynamic corridors. Strategically positioned with effortless access to major intercity highways, Aura Prestige connects you to the city’s vibrant heart and key destinations beyond, making daily commutes and weekend escapes equally seamless.

Step into an environment where refined design meets practical comfort. Each residence and communal space is thoughtfully curated to fuse elegant aesthetics with functional living—luxurious finishes, expansive layouts, and intelligent amenities create homes that are as beautiful as they are livable. Aura Prestige is not merely a building; it’s a lifestyle crafted for those who appreciate sophistication without compromise.

The development offers a comprehensive suite of amenities catering to relaxation, recreation, and wellness. Lush landscaped gardens and tranquil lounges invite quiet moments; state-of-the-art fitness and leisure facilities encourage active living; dedicated family and social zones foster community connections. Every facility is designed to awaken the senses and elevate daily routines.

Aura Prestige celebrates timeless luxury through attention to detail and a commitment to quality. From concierge services to secure, convenient access, every aspect of life here is tailored to deliver comfort, convenience, and peace of mind. For residents, Aura Prestige is where every moment becomes an experience and every return is a welcome home.
chapter-02:
Following the success of Chapter 01, Chapter 02 by Newbury Developments marks a new milestone in the evolution of contemporary living in Dubai. Located in the promising neighborhood of Warsan 4, the project offers a rare blend of tranquility, convenience, and strategic connectivity just an 8-minute walk from the upcoming Blue Line Metro station and close to major road networks and essential infrastructure.

Chapter 02 is more than just a building it’s a thoughtfully crafted environment for life, where every detail reflects a commitment to harmony between aesthetics, functionality, and comfort. From its sculptural façade to the grand double-height lobby, every element is designed to inspire. Community spaces including a resort-style pool deck, a naturally lit gym with panoramic views, and a secure children’s play area come together to create a holistic ecosystem of well-being.

Interiors embody modern sophistication: open layouts, abundant natural light, integrated smart home technology, and premium finishes ensure everyday living is effortless, connected, and comfortable.

Chapter 02 is an address where elegance meets practicality and where design truly serves people. For those who value quality, thoughtful planning, and long-term value both in life and in investment.
maybach-6:
Vision Mercedes-Maybach 6 is a multi-building residential and retail complex planned within Mercedes-Benz Places Binghatti City in Meydan, Dubai, developed by Binghatti Developers. The Maybach 6 component is formed as two individual buildings, Maybach 6 Tower A and Maybach 6 Tower B, designed to align with the broader Mercedes-Benz city concept and its clean, design-led architectural identity.

The project includes a large residential collection with Studio, 1 BR, 2 BR, and 3 BR residences, totaling 1,844 homes. The unit mix is structured as 1,344 studios, 220 1 BR residences, 220 2 BR residences, and 60 3 BR residences. Retail is integrated at ground level with 34 shops, supporting everyday convenience within the complex.

As part of the wider Mercedes-Benz Places Binghatti City environment, Maybach 6 is positioned within a masterplanned destination that combines residential living with curated public spaces. The broader concept is built around an organized city-scale layout, with social and lifestyle functions designed to create a complete day-to-day setting inside the community.
parkgreen-residences: Parkgreen Residences by Alishaan is a visionary residential development thoughtfully crafted in the heart of Liwan, Dubai — a fast-evolving, family-friendly neighborhood known for its connectivity and green urban planning. Rooted in the philosophy of “nature-integrated living,” the project offers a curated collection of 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom homes designed to harmonize modern aesthetics with environmental mindfulness. Every element — from the building’s sustainable architecture and vertical greenery to the serene water features and wellness-focused amenities — is meticulously planned to promote balance, tranquility, and holistic well-being. Residents enjoy access to a holistic ecosystem that includes a fitness studio, co-working spaces, indoor and outdoor play zones for children, and lush communal gardens, all wrapped in an atmosphere of refined calm. With abundant natural light, seamless indoor-outdoor flow, and views that celebrate greenery and skyline alike, Parkgreen transcends conventional urban living. It is not just a place to reside, but a conscious lifestyle choice — one that prioritizes health, connection, and enduring beauty in the rhythm of everyday life.
the-pinnacle:
The Pinnacle at Sobha Central rises as the crowning residential tower within a landmark mixed-use address on Sheikh Zayed Road. Poised above a network of six architecturally striking towers, it offers 1- and 2-bedroom residences with balconies and uninterrupted panoramic views across Downtown Dubai, DIFC, Dubai Marina, Jumeirah Islands and the sea. Designed for measured elegance rather than ostentation, The Pinnacle delivers clarity of access, refined communal facilities and a calm, elevated lifestyle where work, wellness and leisure coexist seamlessly.

Residents benefit from direct, private connectivity to the city, premium on-site office space, and a rich amenity programme — from pools, fitness and sport facilities to green courtyards, outdoor cinema and children’s play zones. The Pinnacle is for those who value perspective: living defined by elevation, proportion and quiet distinction.

riviera-residences-by-mered:
Riviera Residences crafted forliving, designed forlegacy.Design with a profound sense of place. In Abu Dhabi, the project drew on the pearl-diving heritage — once the foundation of the Emirates’ prosperity — translating it into shimmering mother-of-pearl façades on Al Reem Island. As an architectural expression of heritage, these iridescent surfaces honour the courage of the region’s pearl divers and connect the building’s contemporary form to a timeless Gulf tradition.

Framed by sea and sky, a new chapter of waterfront living unfolds, timeless, tranquil, and distinctly refined. A modern statement of design and detail. Each home reflects Riviera Residences’ vision, effortless luxury defined by light, proportion, and an enduring connection to the sea.

Just beyond your residence, a vibrant waterfront comes alive. Cafés, dining terraces, and boutique retail bring rhythm to the waterfront — from slow mornings with coffee by the sea to al fresco dinners under the stars. Here, everyday life flows as easily as the tide.

The essence of leisure defines life at Riviera Residences. Sunlit pools, outdoor cafés, and a collection of terraces offer settings for both serene retreats and lively gatherings. Indoors, elegant lounges, a bar and café, and a private business lounge create refined spaces to relax, connect, and enjoy life in style.

At Riviera Residences, life moves at a gentler pace — where energy flows as naturally as the sea. Three indoor fitness zones and an open-air terrace invite balance and vitality, while a padel court and serene sports pool bring lightness to daily living. Wellness is a state of mind, shaped by restorative spa rituals, calm gardens, and open-air lounges — each designed to quiet the noise and restore your natural rhythm.

Nestled amid landscaped green spaces, it offers a thoughtful mix of stylish apartments and family-friendly amenities. Each home features bright, open-plan interiors, high-quality finishes, efficient layouts and large windows that flood rooms with natural light. Residents enjoy convenient on-site facilities such as a fitness center, communal lounge, secure parking and dedicated children’s play areas. 

Sunvale’s location provides easy access to shops, schools, transport links and leisure options, making daily errands and commutes simple. Built with attention to sustainability, the development includes energy-efficient systems and green communal areas that promote well-being. Ideal for young professionals, families and downsizers seeking contemporary design and practical living, Sunvale combines comfort, convenience and community in a desirable neighborhood setting.

kingdom-gate:
Kingdom Gate is a premium residential tower in Dubai’s Al Furjan that redefines modern living. This elegant development offers fully furnished apartments and penthouses designed with smart layouts and floor-to-ceiling windows that flood interiors with natural light and showcase panoramic views. Each residence blends contemporary style with high-quality finishes and integrated technology for effortless living. 

Residents enjoy a curated suite of luxury amenities—swimming pools, fitness center, landscaped terraces, concierge service and secure parking—creating a quiet sanctuary within the city. Strategically located, Kingdom Gate provides seamless access to metro links, major business hubs and leisure destinations, making daily commutes and weekend plans effortless. Tailored for discerning professionals and families, Kingdom Gate combines sophistication, convenience and thoughtful design for those who expect nothing less than excellence.
divine-elements:
Divine Elements is not just another residential development — it’s a bold reimagining of urban luxury in Dubai, where every curve, every material, and every detail has been meticulously curated for those who seek harmony between elegance, innovation, and inspiration. Strategically located in one of the city’s most dynamic districts, this architectural masterpiece offers a new standard of living that blends contemporary design with seamless functionality and breathtaking views.

The building’s façade is a sculptural statement — fluid, organic lines evoke the motion of water or the drape of fine fabric, creating a sense of rhythm and grace even in stillness. Floor-to-ceiling glass panels flood interiors with natural light while dissolving boundaries between inside and out, framing sweeping vistas of the city skyline and distant landscapes.

At the crown of the structure lies aninfinity-edge rooftop pool, where residents can float above the city, sipping cocktails as the sun dips below the horizon. Surrounding the pool are lounge zones with designer daybeds, lush greenery, an open-air cinema, and dedicated social spaces perfect for evening gatherings. For the active lifestyle enthusiast, there’s a tennis court, ping pong tables, fitness stations, and serene meditation gardens.

Inside, interiors feel like a gallery of modern art — soft neutral palettes, tactile textures, built-in smart storage, and intuitive home automation systems create environments that are both calming and sophisticated. Kitchens feature premium appliances and sleek finishes, while bedrooms offer sanctuary-like retreats with ambient lighting, panoramic windows, and curated decor. Even the smallest details — from door handles to rug patterns — have been thoughtfully selected to elevate daily life into a sensory experience.

Designed for those who don’t just want to live in a home, but to inhabit a space that reflects their identity, values, and pursuit of excellence — Divine Elements leaves nothing to chance. Every element works together to inspire, comfort, and delight.

Divine Elements isn’t just a place to live. It’s a way of life.

Positioned on the lively, walkable promenade and framed by landscaped courtyards, Nura offers island life fused with urban energy—homes that place you at the centre of everyday life by the sea.

aykon-city-3:
Located in one of the most prestigious neighborhoods in Dubai along Sheikh Zayed Road with stunning views of the Dubai Canal, Aykon City embodies luxury living at its finest. Aykon City offers a collection of luxury serviced apartments that provide residents with the ultimate in comfort and convenience.

Surrounded by iconic landmarks and global luxury brands, Aykon City boasts a prime location that allows residents to be at the center of Dubai’s vibrant community. From the renowned Burj area to the bustling Business Bay and the Dubai International Financial District, residents have easy access to some of the city’s most popular destinations. On the other side of Sheikh Zayed Road, Safa Park, City Walk, and Box Park offer opportunities for urban leisure and relaxation.

The amenities and advantages of Aykon City are unmatched, providing residents with a world of convenience and intelligent design. From luxurious leisure experiences to top-notch facilities, every aspect of Aykon City is crafted to enhance the living experience of its residents.

Living in Aykon City also means having the city’s attractions right at your doorstep, allowing residents to immerse themselves in the vibrant energy and culture of Dubai. Whether it's shopping, dining, entertainment, or simply enjoying the beauty of the surroundings, Aykon City offers a lifestyle that is unparalleled. sensi:
Sensi is a mixed-use development on Saadiyat Island, Abu Dhabi, combining residential living with retail and lifestyle elements in one address. The concept focuses on calm, light-filled spaces and a minimalist architectural approach, with a smooth connection between indoor areas and the outdoor setting.

The residence collection includes apartments and townhouses, with a total of 89 homes. The unit mix features 2-bedroom and 3-bedroom apartments, plus a limited number of 4-bedroom townhouses. Layouts include private balconies and terraces, with contemporary fit-out and finishing. Depending on the configuration, a laundry room and maid’s room are included, and the project provides basement parking with a large overall capacity.

Everyday amenities support both relaxation and routine: a swimming pool, children’s play areas, a fully equipped gym, landscaped outdoor gardens, a business center, cafés, and retail spaces. The Saadiyat Island location also places key cultural and lifestyle destinations within easy reach, including NYU Abu Dhabi, Saadiyat Marina and Beach, and major museum landmarks such as Louvre Abu Dhabi and Guggenheim Abu Dhabi.
creek-bay:
Creek Bay emerges from the calm expanse of Dubai Creek, where nature, water, and urban beauty meet. Wrapped in sweeping creek views and framed by the iconic Burj Khalifa and Downtown Dubai’s skyline, it stands as an idyllic bay that holds pristine water frontage and endless horizons of blue, nurturing a deep sense of bliss within. 241-waterside-residences:
True luxury is crafted, not assembled. Light, stone and glass open to serene vistas of calm & clarity, blurring indoors and out, creating a rhythm where architecture and horizon become one.

Here, every surface is a deliberate interval - Rooms are not decorated; they are calibrated. Materiality speaks in undertones: the matte of unlacquered bronze that refuses to announce itself, stone cut thick enough to hold temperature, wood so pale it seems to defer. Nothing competes for attention because nothing needs to. The luxury is measured in what has been removed - pattern, ornament, the anxious need to impress.

Open layouts, textured materials, and refined details create an atmosphere of effortless elegance. From expansive residences to the Signature Sky Lofts with their double-height ceilings and natural flow, every home celebrates craftsmanship and calm. These are spaces made for living beautifully, where every finish feels intentional and every view feels composed.

This project is strategically located in a prime area with quick and easy access to major landmarks such as EXPO 2020, airports, metro stations, and shopping destinations like Damac Mall and Mall of the Emirates.
anna-court:
Is a new apartment block, part of a modern residential cul-de-sac development, located in an excellent area of the coastal town of Livadia. It is close to the sea, with easy access to Larnaca center, in a quiet area that offers all amenities while at the same time giving the neighborhood feeling to its residents.

With the imminent commencement of the New Larnaca Port and Marina, one of the largest investment projects in Cyprus, the region of Livadia has become one of the most sought-after areas for property investment.

A block of 6 two-bed apartments,  is a contemporarily designed building, offering functional and stylish living spaces. The south-east orientation provides natural light in living spaces, highlighting the clean lines and detailed finishes within. The independent positioning of the units offers maximum privacy.

Only two apartments on each of the three floors, with the third-floor units enjoying private and individual access to a large roof garden on the 4th floor with its barbeque area, as well as an extra wc-shower and room that can be converted into 3rd bedroom. Furthermore, these top floor units will have the option for net metering and a photovoltaic system.

  • 2 Ensuite bedrooms
  • Guest wc + extra on RG
  • Covered Areas per flat: approx. 80 m2+ 50.8 m2 RG
  • Verandas: 18-20 m2
  • cul-de-sac project
