nourelle:
Nourelle is the latest addition to the prestigious Madinat Jumeirah Living community, offering a trio of contemporary residential towers seamlessly connected by a dramatic skybridge. Nestled adjacent to iconic landmarks like Burj Al Arab, Jumeirah Marsa Al Arab, and Jumeirah Beach Hotel, Nourelle provides unparalleled sea-front views, sunset vistas, and close access to pristine beaches and lush promenades. The project beautifully combines modern comforts with timeless design, featuring clean lines, bold geometry, and elegant cut-outs softened by greenery to maximize natural light and create open, breathable living spaces. 

Residents enjoy a lifestyle that balances serene retreat with vibrant connection, all within a private, refined community. Positioned at the heart of Dubai’s most desirable neighborhoods, Nourelle offers exceptional connectivity to the airport, business hubs, leisure destinations, and retail, redefining architectural elegance and setting new standards through its sculptural skybridge, contemporary interiors, and meticulously crafted shared spaces.
symbolic-altus:
An exclusive collection of 108 residences in Liwan, featuring 1 BHK Elite and 2.5 BHK Panorama apartments, fully furnished and thoughtfully designed with a modern closed-kitchen concept. Each home is crafted for elevated living, blending timeless architectural elegance with rooftop wellness spaces, panoramic views and a serene community lifestyle, adjacent to the sports arena.

At Symbolic Altus, modern city living reaches new heights. Nestled in Liwan's refined residential district, it is a masterpiece of space, light and visionary architecture. Rooftop wellness sanctuaries, lush landscaped balconies and calming panoramic views converge to create a lifestyle where beauty, balance and elevation define every moment.
skygate-tower:
SkyGate Tower by Tiger Properties is a 43-storey landmark rising in Jumeirah Village Triangle, blending modern architecture with nature-inspired living. With lush green spaces, landscaped atriums, and a stunning horizon-edge swimming pool, the tower offers a serene escape in the heart of the city.

This luxury residential tower features Fully-Furnished Studio, 1-2 Bedroom Apartments & 3-4 Bedroom Duplexes.

Located in JVT District 4, the tower offers the perfect balance of suburban living and city life. The neighborhood has a family friendly atmosphere, parks and greenery, and a peaceful escape off the city. But still, major highways of Dubai, business centers, entertainment spots, and international airports are within walking distance. With top schools, shopping centres, and leisure facilities just minutes away, the project is the perfect place for those who want convenience, a sense of community, and connectivity.
eywa-the-way-of-water:
Eywa 2 is a new incarnation of the legendary Eywa project, created by the European developer in collaboration with Zane Tetere-Sulce (OAD) and John R. Harris & Partners. The project combines architecture, nature, and cutting-edge technology, offering ultra-luxury wellness residences where harmony and comfort become a way of life.

The interiors of Eywa 2 are crafted from eco-friendly, non-toxic, and premium materials, including marble and natural wood. Each residence is thoughtfully designed down to the last detail: panoramic views, spacious terraces, private pools, walk-in closets, and spa-like bathrooms. Kitchens are equipped with Miele and Liebherr appliances, and the larger floor plans feature second kitchens with Bosch appliances.

The project is based on a philosophy of well-being. Eywa 2 integrates innovative wellness systems: MERV-14 air filtration, Alfa Omega structured "living water," electromagnetic field protection, and smart space management. The project is certified according to international WELL, LEED, and WiredScore Platinum standards, ensuring maximum comfort and safety.

Eywa 2 offers an exclusive lifestyle: six swimming pools, a Nohrd spa and fitness complex, a yoga studio, meditation spaces, a tea house, a library, and a waterfall cinema. Residents will have access to the Eywa Wellness Membership Club, a personal health and longevity concierge, and lifestyle services that create an atmosphere of absolute care and harmony.
wadi-hills:
Wadi Hills by HRE Development is a new benchmark in Wadi Al Safa, offering contemporary, timeless design and a lifestyle-focused community in Dubai Land.

Positioned for strong future value with improved road links and rapid access to key destinations, the project combines thoughtfully sized residences—from studios to three-bedroom homes—with premium finishes, floor-to-ceiling windows and generous layouts. Residents enjoy an infinity-edge pool, kids’ nature-integrated play areas, gym and wellness spaces, elegant lobby with concierge, and smart-home entry systems.
lyvia-by-palace:
Nestled within Dubai Creek Harbour’s Green Gate, Lyvia by Palace is a striking expression of elegance and retreat. More than just a home, this branded residence offers a canvas for luxurious, nature-inspired living. Surrounded by lush greenery and designed with contemporary sophistication, Lyvia is a sanctuary that blends tranquility with urban vibrancy. Here, nature, architecture, and prestige converge to create a lifestyle as exceptional as it is unique. A new rhythm, an exclusive setting, and a fresh story waiting to be written.

Life at Lyvia is centered on serenity. Imagine mornings with sweeping green vistas, weekends spent wandering through lively landscapes, and evenings relaxing in refined, modern interiors. Every element is crafted to bring calm—featuring state-of-the-art amenities, peaceful surroundings, and spaces that are both intimate and connected. Here, nature softens the pace of urban living, offering a haven to recharge and flourish.

Beyond its serene atmosphere, Lyvia embodies Palace’s vision of curated luxury and community. With inviting terraces, garden hideaways, and areas for social gatherings, residents can enjoy both leisure and connection. Thanks to convenient access to nearby retail, gourmet dining, and cultural venues, balanced living is always within reach.

At Lyvia, greenery lies at the heart of the community, with each residence carefully positioned to capture verdant views. From peaceful garden nooks and airy promenades to sweeping panoramas throughout, the environment fosters a sense of calm, movement, and belonging. This master-planned enclave within Dubai Creek Harbour represents a forward-thinking vision of urban life, complemented by world-class amenities.
purvanchal-triana-residences:
Purvanchal Triana Residences — an architectural gem in the heart of Jumeirah Garden City, where contemporary luxury meets thoughtful functionality.
This residential complex, featuring basement parking and a double-level podium, is more than a building — it’s a carefully curated environment for refined urban living. The façade embraces minimalist design: floor-to-ceiling windows, glass-enclosed balconies, and clean geometric lines evoke a sense of lightness, space, and privacy. Upper levels follow a unified layout concept for optimal comfort, while the ground floor offers a distinctive configuration — including more compact balconies — without compromising on premium finishes.
The rooftop transforms into a serene urban oasis: an infinity pool overlooking Dubai’s skyline, lounge areas with daybeds, tropical palms, and soft ambient lighting — perfect for relaxation or casual gatherings. Surrounding the building are landscaped gardens, shaded walkways, and convenient parking, making daily life both elegant and effortless.
Interiors feature a neutral palette enriched with warm wood and green accents, fostering a calm and inviting atmosphere. Spacious layouts, abundant natural light, marble flooring, built-in appliances, and high-end sanitaryware reflect meticulous attention to detail — all designed for your everyday comfort.
Developed byPurvanchal Group — a trusted name with over 30 years of experience in North India and multiple successful projects in Dubai, including Sunbliss Residences and luxury villas in Jebel Ali Hills — Triana embodies their commitment to reliability, quality, and client trust. This is more than a residence; it’s an investment in a lifestyle defined by excellence.
elmora:
Nestled between Jumeirah Garden City and Sheikh Zayed Road, this exclusive address of just 85 fully furnished residences delivers panoramic views of the Burj Khalifa, Dubai Frame and the Museum of the Future.  

Residents enjoy a curated suite of services including concierge, smart grocery delivery, chef on demand, housekeeping, airport transfers and nutritionist on call. On-site facilities are comprehensive: contemporary coworking spaces, jogging track, state-of-the-art gym, infinity lap pool, jacuzzi with scenic views, male and female sauna suites, business lounge and an elegantly landscaped podium. 

Developed by Neoterra Developments in partnership with GRID for lifecycle management, Elmora blends design brilliance with executional excellence to create a future-ready urban landmark. Flexible payment terms and staged instalments make ownership accessible, while a limited collection ensures rarity and enduring prestige.
bond-living:
Bond Living by Pearlshire Development is a boutique residential project located in the Dubai Land Residence Complex (DLRC), designed to offer a calm yet well-connected urban lifestyle. The development features a low-density mid-rise building with a curated selection of studios, as well as 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom apartments. Each residence is planned with a focus on smart layouts, natural light, and everyday functionality, reflecting a modern and practical approach to living.

The project benefits from its location within the growing DLRC community, providing convenient access to major road networks, educational institutions, retail destinations, and leisure facilities. This strategic positioning makes Bond Living attractive for both end-users seeking comfortable city living and investors looking for long-term rental demand in an emerging residential area of Dubailand.

Bond Living’s design philosophy is rooted in hospitality-inspired living, prioritizing intuitive layouts, balanced proportions, and a sense of privacy. With a limited number of residential units, the project fosters a boutique community atmosphere while maintaining the advantages of being part of a larger, well-planned neighborhood.
academia-tower:
Our last available apartment - 601 with separate Title Deed

Is a 7-floor luxury apartment building excellently located in Larnaca town centre, in a quiet residential area behind the American Academy school and close to amenities. The famous Finikudes sea promenade is only 700m away. Larnaca also hosts the main International Airport at a distance of 8.3 km.

Three apartments are allocated to the first and second floors, all of which consist of an open-plan living and kitchen area, 2 bedrooms (the master with an en-suite shower), a main bathroom, and a covered veranda.

The top-floor apartments, with 4 bedrooms located on the 6th floor, enjoy individual access to their private roof garden on the 7th floor, hosting the 4th bedroom, a WC/shower room, sauna and a barbecue area. These flats also benefit from solar panel net metering, offering the prospective buyer an extra financial incentive.

The sectioned architectural design  allows independent positioning of the apartments on each floor, offering maximum privacy.

A huge demand for rentals has been noticed in this area. An excellent investment opportunity that can create an income of 5% from yearly rentals and up to 9% for short term rentals.

Free of mortgage. Title deeds guaranteed. Price +VAT
charalambos-residences:
Located just 300 meters from the sea and near the upcoming Larnaca Port and Marina Development “Land of Tomorrow,” this new project on Dhekelia–Livadia Road offers a blend of luxury and modern coastal living.

Set on a corner plot in a highly desirable area with strong growth potential, the development combines a peaceful residential atmosphere with easy access to amenities such as shops, restaurants, and a shopping mall.

The project comprises one- and two-bedroom apartments within a contemporary building distinguished by its elegant architecture and functional design. Each residence is crafted to ensure comfort, privacy, and spacious living areas, enhanced by large verandas with beautiful views.

The two penthouse apartments feature private roof gardens with full sea views, barbecue areas, additional rooms with WC and shower, and extra storage. They are also equipped with modern upgrades including photovoltaic systems with net metering, Jacuzzi bars, three-phase power supply, and provisions for underfloor heating.

This development represents an exceptional opportunity for modern seaside living in one of Larnaca’s most promising areas.
derby-heights:
Derby Heights offers a quieter kind of city living. Mornings feel unrushed, neighbourhood streets are calm, and everything you need is within easy reach, from landscaped parklands and artisanal cafés to top-rated schools and Downtown Dubai. It’s not about stepping away from the city, it’s about living better within it.

At Derby Heights, design lives in the details. From the rich timber tones and soft pendant lighting to the clean lines and quiet confidence, it’s a space where every element feels considered. A home that not only looks good, but feels right. Interiors feature A Casamia Spatial Edit, a thoughtful collaboration that brings added warmth and refinement to the everyday.

Whether you choose the one or two-bedroom apartment at Derby Heights, the open-plan layout gives you space to breathe, to move, and to live your day your way. With floor-to- ceiling windows, light floods the room, casting a warm, welcoming glow across your living and dining space. It’s easy, effortless, and exactly how home should feel.
la-perla:
The architecture of La Perla mirrors its name, a precious pearl cradled by the sea. With a configuration of 2B+G+6+R and only 57 bespoke residences, it offers an elevated sense of privacy, exclusivity, and spatial luxury. The project includes spacious 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments, penthouses with high ceilings and landscaped Spanish courtyards, as well as duplexes with contemporary loft aesthetics. The building’s curvature complements the coastline while framing intentional views of lush green spaces and the Arabian Gulf. 

The exterior design of La Perla draws upon organic symmetry. Its ocean-inspired silhouette gives it a rare softness against the island’s skyline, while generous terraces blur the line between indoors and out, with landscaped open spaces to the east and a vibrant public realm at its base.

La Perla engages with its surroundings, not just as a building, but as part of a lifestyle. Sunlight dances off fluid balconies, while the interplay of curves and angles delivers a coastal identity.
lumena-alta:
From its very name, LUMENA ALTA signals a place where ambition meets brilliance. Lumena, drawn from the Latin lumen, evokes pure radiance as a symbol of vision, creativity, and innovation. Alta, meaning elevated, speaks to stature, aspiration, and architectural height.

Together, LUMENA ALTA becomes a statement of elevated light, a destination where illumination and elevation converge.

Rising 380 metres above the city, LUMENA ALTA is a living sculpture of light and movement. Conceived for global visionaries who define the future of business and culture, this next- generation mixed-use icon unites luxury commercial, residential, and lifestyle spaces within a single, soaring masterpiece.

The building arcs outward like a movement suspended in time. The tower’s graceful, spiralling façade sets a new architectural benchmark for Dubai. Every curve of its dynamic form is designed to capture and refract light. By day, the tower gleams with radiance. By night, it glows as if lit from within, a luminous instrument written into the skyline. Its aerodynamic geometry speaks of progression and ambition translated into form, a landmark designed to endure as sculpture upon the horizon.

sky-line:
Sky Line by Peace Homes is a newly launched 31-storey residential development in the heart of DubaiLand Residence Complex. This modern tower is designed for those who value vertical architecture, a convenient location and a well-curated lifestyle. Sky Line brings together the energy of the city with the comfort of a private, refined living environment, where every detail reflects the high standards of Peace Homes.

The project offers residents a rich selection of amenities: a temperature-controlled swimming pool, a fully equipped fitness center, yoga and relaxation areas, landscaped gardens, children’s playgrounds, and retail spaces on the lower floors. The community provides everything needed for a fulfilling lifestyle — from leisure and wellness to work and family time. Security is ensured with 24/7 monitoring and access control.

Thanks to its strategic location, Sky Line provides quick access to major highways, making it easy to reach business districts, the airport, schools, shopping centers and Dubai’s key attractions. This is a development that combines strong investment potential with comfortable living for long-term residents.
helvetia-marine:
Helvetia Azure is a new project by DHG Properties located on Dubai Islands. The development consists of G + 2P + 8 floors and offers 63 residences, including 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments as well as duplexes with maid’s rooms. The project emphasizes refined living with Swiss-quality interiors, premium finishes, and design by Rina Rankova Two 88 Studio.

The residences feature smart layouts with carefully selected materials and imported European equipment. Apartment sizes range from compact 1BR units starting at around 803 sq ft to spacious 3BR apartments of over 2,500 sq ft. Each home is designed to balance comfort, elegance, and functionality, making it suitable for a wide range of lifestyles.

The community provides exclusive amenities such as a rooftop swimming pool with a bar, indoor and outdoor gyms, yoga and relaxation zones, landscaped gardens, and social spaces. Families benefit from kids’ play areas and 24-hour concierge services. Located just minutes from beaches, dining spots, shopping malls, and parks, the project also offers quick access to Downtown Dubai, Dubai International Airport, and the metro station .
tonino-lamborghini-residences-2:
Guided by the Tonino Lamborghini ethos of elegance, uncompromised style, design and innovation, Tonino Lamborghini Residences RAK project is conceived not merely as a residence but as an architectural statement where Italian sophistication merges with the elemental beauty of sea and sand. The design translates the rhythm of waves and dunes into cascading terraces and sky gardens, balancing exclusivity and openness through private villas and mansions alongside vibrant communal realms. Ultimately, it is a legacy of lifestyle and a timeless expression of identity, aspiration, and belonging on Ras Al Khaimah’s coastline.

Tonino Lamborghini Residences’ elevation draws a sculpted coastal profile, its cascading terraces and sky gardens tuned to the island’s prevailing winds and tidal rhythms. A contemporary yet enduring language guides every line: assertive forms moderated by tactile, natural textures and discreet metallic accents refined by Tonino Lamborghini’s iconic lines and elements. Terraces are carefully proportioned to maintain views, provide shade along the promenades, and soften natural light. Native planting blends the architecture with the shoreline's ecosystem, while the landmark's form ensures privacy and a sense of calm. Altogether, the composition harmonises luxury with nature, projecting quiet confidence and timeless poise along Al Marjan.

Interiors are conceived as an extension of Tonino Lamborghini’s design language - bold, refined, and quietly elegant. Clean architectural lines frame generous volumes, allowing light to move freely across textured surfaces and tailored finishes. A restrained palette of warm neutrals, and subtle metallic accents establishes continuity with the coastal setting while maintaining an unmistakably style. Every element is deliberate: from calibrated proportions to tactile details that invite touch. The result is a living environment that feels composed yet expressive, where craftsmanship, comfort, and clarity coexist effortlessly.

Boldness and wellness are intentionally woven into daily life: a modern gymnasium supports rigorous training and precise performance; a sauna restores circulation and quiets the senses; and a dedicated yoga area invites mindful breath, balance and length. The sequence moves deliberately from exertion to release, from heat to hush, creating a restorative cadence that settles the body and focuses the mind. Equipment is contemporary, spaces are softly lit, and the atmosphere remains serene. Composed for discipline, recovery, and lasting clarity. It feels private, purposeful, beautifully composed throughout.
azizi-noura:
Azizi Noura is a prestigious residential development located in the thriving Jebel Ali area, offering unparalleled connectivity to Dubai’s key business and leisure destinations. Positioned just steps away from Sheikh Zayed Road and the Life Pharmacy Metro Station, it ensures effortless commuting across the city.

The project features freehold studios, as well as one-, two-, and three-bedroom residences, each thoughtfully designed with sophisticated interiors and refined finishes to create elegant living spaces. Residents enjoy exclusive access to premium fitness and wellness facilities, a leisure pool, and beautifully landscaped outdoor areas, enhancing the lifestyle experience.

Situated adjacent to JAFZA, the Middle East’s largest port and free zone, and surrounded by over 100 Fortune Global 500 companies, Azizi Noura offers exceptional potential for ROI. This development perfectly balances comfort, convenience, and investment appeal in one of Dubai’s most dynamic neighborhoods.
floarea-breeze:
Floarea Breeze by Mashriq Elite is an intimate, masterfully designed island community on Dubai Islands offering refined coastal living. Comprising a limited collection of 52 apartments (1–3 bedrooms) and four townhouses, the development blends thoughtful layouts, premium materials and designer interiors to create bright, spacious homes with floor-to-ceiling glazing, expansive balconies, Italian tile flooring and fully fitted kitchens with Bosch appliances. 

Residents enjoy resort-style amenities across two lifestyle floors: infinity and kids pools, indoor gym, sky lounge, sunken meditation deck, play areas, game nooks, rooftop BBQ and smart-home integration with Alexa. Strategically positioned with upcoming bridge access, Floarea Breeze provides seamless connectivity to Dubai’s landmarks, beaches, malls and cultural hubs, delivering a family-focused, sustainable coastal enclave where convenience, craftsmanship and timeless elegance meet.
aurea:
Elegantly situated along the vibrant promenade of Rashid Yachts & Marina, Aurea offers the essence of chic marina life. Enjoy direct access to both historic sites and modern comforts, where a dynamic atmosphere blends with tranquil waterfront surroundings. Set against a backdrop of expansive marina views, the Downtown Dubai skyline, and verdant parks, Aurea is enveloped by yacht berths, green spaces, and a curated selection of dining, retail, and leisure options that elevate daily living to an extraordinary experience.

At Aurea, each day brings a feeling of tranquility and exploration. Awaken to sweeping marina and city vistas, then immerse yourself in the cadence of waterfront living: morning strolls along peaceful walkways, moments of contemplation in lush gardens, or relaxing swims in gleaming pools—all thoughtfully designed to foster a connection with nature, community, and oneself.

Venture from Aurea's private sanctuary into the lively Marina Promenade, where picturesque waterfront paths, boutique stores, retail shops, cafés, and diverse restaurants create a vibrant yet laid-back ambiance. Perfectly located within Rashid Yachts & Marina, a peerless destination, Aurea establishes a bold new benchmark for living, leisure, and community well-being.
helvetia-verde:
Helvetia Verde by DHG Real Estate is set in Meydan Horizon, Dubai. The project stands with G + 2P + 17 floors and offers only 108 residences, making it both exclusive and private. The design reflects Swiss quality with refined European materials and the signature work of Rina Rankova Two 88 Studio.

The residences include 1BR, 2BR, and 3BR with maid’s room, starting from 857 sq.ft. Each unit is carefully planned with smart layouts, premium finishes, and stylish details. Interiors are crafted to balance comfort, functionality, and long-lasting elegance.

Amenities feature a swimming pool, indoor and outdoor gyms, yoga and meditation zone, jogging track, landscaped gardens, and play areas for children. Residents also enjoy a concierge lobby, retail spaces, and proximity to the lagoon beach, promenade, Downtown Dubai, and Meydan One Mall.
the-tranquil:
Positioned on Sheikh Zayed Road, Sobha Central offers an exclusive address at the city’s core. Its six iconic towers provide seamless connectivity, from private road access to the nearby metro. Experience unobstructed skyline views from masterfully designed 1- and 2-bedroom residences, all within a fully integrated community.

Veering off the traditional path, Sobha Central holds its innovation in a large urban park on top of its crown jewel - the podium which treats residents to a spectacular view from their homes.

With dedicated office spaces and rooftop retreats, every corner invites you to connect, unwind, or simply be. Business centers, fitness areas, shaded green zones, and everyday essentials flow seamlessly, creating a community built for real life. From the grand prayer hall to the commercial gym, boutique retail to the supermarket, every space supports wellness, connection, and effortless routines— whether it’s an early morning spin, a quick football game, or a quiet moment in the meditation room.

The Tranquil at Sobha Central stands in a league of its own. With unobstructed views at every turn, this tower is designed not just for living but for fully experiencing life. Every moment feels elevated, every space inspires, and each day becomes something to celebrate.
wellness-estate:
Vincitore Wellness Estate is a prestigious residential development that redefines luxury living with a strong focus on wellness in the heart of Majan, DubaiLand. This elegant 36-storey tower by Vincitore Real Estate Development offers a sophisticated collection of premium studio, 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments, each thoughtfully designed to combine modern aesthetics with comfort and functionality. The project embodies a sanctuary where health, beauty, and harmony intersect with architectural excellence, creating a unique living experience.

Residents benefit from an array of wellness-inspired amenities, including infinity pools, yoga decks, spa zones, and sky gardens, promoting a balanced and healthy lifestyle. The spacious interiors feature smart layouts that maximize natural light and space, ensuring a serene environment. Strategically located, Wellness Estate provides excellent connectivity to Dubai’s key business districts, entertainment venues, and major attractions, making it ideal for both homeowners and investors seeking value and elegance.

Vincitore Wellness Estate sets a new standard for urban living by prioritizing well-being alongside luxury, offering a perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and style in one of Dubai’s most promising communities. Discover a life where wellness truly comes first.
samana-hills-south-3:
Samana Hills South 3 is a contemporary six-story residential tower located in Saih Shuaib 2, Dubai Industrial City, Dubai South, Dubai. This residential project offers modern living solutions in one of Dubai's fastest-growing areas, combining convenience and state-of-the-art infrastructure.

Dubai Industrial City's location in Dubai South provides residents with excellent connections to major business districts, transportation hubs, and essential services. This area is a growing residential and business hub, attracting both end users and investors looking to capitalize on Dubai's rapidly evolving urban environment.

Samana Hills South 3 features thoughtfully designed apartments that prioritize comfort, functionality, and style. With spacious layouts, high-quality finishes, and a range of amenities including secure parking, landscaped gardens, and 24/7 security, the development caters to the needs of modern families and professionals. Its strategic location, combined with affordable pricing, makes it an ideal choice for those seeking contemporary urban living in Dubai’s emerging communities.
aqua-maya:
Inspired by the essence of serenity and the rhythm of the sea, Aqua Maya draws from elemental balance to craft spaces of harmony. With a design layout that prioritizes natural light and seamless indoor-outdoor transitions, the building offers residences that respect privacy while celebrating openness. Every line, curve, and corner is built to create an experience of quiet, intentional luxury.

Aqua Maya’s architecture is a dialogue between nature and design. Rising 2B + G + 9 + R floors high, the tower rests on a landscaped podium that connects every part of the building effortlessly. Its balcony-led façade mimics the soft movements of sea waves, brought to life by subtle illumination at night. The use of earthy tones and an articulated structure gives the building a warm identity, grounded in modern sophistication.

Every element of Aqua Maya is designed for those who find luxury in thoughtfulness. From smart spatial flow and panoramic views to high-end finishes and purposeful material choices, the residences are composed with restraint and richness. Here, elegance is not an embellishment but an essence. Each room is crafted for comfort and clarity. Every fixture reflects premium functionality.

Aqua Maya rises along the shores of Al Marjan Island as a boutique residential address for those who prioritize calm and comfort. Seamlessly blending thoughtful design, natural surroundings, and a sense of community, this architectural gem brings together simplicity and elegance in a way that feels both rare and deeply personal.
enta:
ENTA is not just another real estate development; it’s a distinctive living experience designed for those seeking a home that truly reflects their lifestyle. Located on Mina Island, Ras Al Khaimah, just 45 minutes from Dubai, ENTA offers 119 exclusive, fully furnished and styled studios, 1-bedroom, and 2-bedroom units designed with raw textures, natural elements, and spacious interiors that allow you to breathe and be yourself. This move-in ready project combines urban convenience with serene waterfront island living, providing privacy when you want it and vibrant community spaces when you don’t.

Created by the visionary team behind HIVE and RAK Properties, ENTA is backed by extensive expertise in thoughtful community building. Residents enjoy access to a range of premium amenities including flex workspaces, a restaurant, café, concept store, fitness centre, infrared saunas, cold plunge pools, rooftop waterfront promenade, BBQ areas, swimming pool, outdoor lounge, library, and a residents’ lounge.

The development is crafted with intention and effortless sophistication, emphasizing quality, style, and a seamless lifestyle on your terms.
368-park-ln:
New Tabeer Developments premium residential project in the prestigious Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC).

The property offers an extensive suite of premium amenities. On the first floor, residents will find a resort-style swimming pool, a lazy river, a modern fitness center, and a children's splash zone. The rooftop features an open-air cinema, a BBQ area, landscaped gardens, and serene lounge spaces. Comprehensive security and concierge services ensure a secure and comfortable environment.
elar1s-sky:
ELAR1S Sky by Object One is located in District 3 of Jumeirah Village Triangle. The building has a structure of B+G+5P+MF+37+R, offering a modern urban design that emphasizes balance, light, and tranquility. The concept is inspired by natural harmony, with spaces for living and community interaction integrated into one environment.

The project features a mix of studios, 1-bedroom, and 2-bedroom apartments. Homes are designed with functional layouts that maximize space and provide comfort for different lifestyles. Smart home systems and digital solutions are included, offering residents greater control over lighting, climate, and security.

Amenities include lush gardens, a clubhouse, pools for adults and children, a sky infinity pool, gym, outdoor lounge, and dedicated play areas. The location in Jumeirah Village Triangle provides proximity to attractions such as Palm Jumeirah, Circle Mall, and Dubai Miracle Garden, all within a short drive.
soulever-towers:
Soulever Towers is a modern residential complex that combines the comfort of urban living with harmony with nature. The project consists of two tall towers, each featuring a minimalist design using modern materials and technologies. The interior spaces have been meticulously designed to create a cozy and comfortable environment for residents of all ages.

The residential portfolio offers a variety of apartment layouts, from studios to spacious multi-room apartments, to meet the needs of different families. The complex includes commercial space, equipped recreation areas, playgrounds, and landscaped grounds with green spaces. Underground parking and utility facilities are also located on the premises to ensure comfortable living.

Soulever Towers is conveniently located in a well-developed area, close to schools, medical facilities, shops, and transportation hubs. The project is designed for those who value quality, safety, and a modern urban lifestyle, offering high standards of amenities and convenience in a dynamic metropolitan environment.

Amenities:

  • Residential lounge
  • Gym
  • Outdoor Yoga
  • Exercise Park
  • Swimming Pool
  • Podium Park
  • Family Area
  • Library
elle-residences:
Introducing ELLE Residences — the first project in the Middle East to combine the elegance of high fashion with sophisticated modern architecture. Located on the picturesque Dubai Islands, these residences are a new icon of style, design, and waterfront luxury.
Developed by ANAX Developments, the project offers a unique blend of refined interiors, panoramic sea views, and impeccable service. ELLE Residences is more than just a home — it's a lifestyle for those who value fashion, art, and comfort.
creek-beach-canopy-moor:
Moor at Creek Beach, developed by Emaar Properties, embodies the pinnacle of waterfront architecture in Dubai Creek Harbour. This exclusive development presents a curated collection of one, two, and three-bedroom apartments, framed by the historic vistas of the iconic Dubai Creek. It offers a lifestyle of unmatched sophistication, where natural beauty, urban convenience, and modern luxury converge. This premium residence is poised to redefine the standard for waterfront living in Dubai.

Nestled in the vibrant heart of Dubai Creek Harbour, this iconic address provides a distinctly modern, stylish, and pedestrian-friendly community. The neighbourhood masterfully integrates residential, commercial, and leisure spaces, all embraced by the timeless waters of the Creek. Encompassing 7.4 million square metres of residential areas and 500,000 square metres of verdant parks and open spaces, it creates a dynamic yet serene district that encourages residents to fully engage with their environment. The development also boasts seamless connectivity to major road networks, linking you effortlessly to all of Dubai.

Moor presents a rare opportunity to embrace waterfront living in its most refined form. Each day begins with panoramic Creek views and the soothing sounds of the water, offering a serene retreat from the urban pace. As part of a privileged beachside community, residents enjoy direct access to tranquil sandy shores. Leisurely beach walks, sun-soaked relaxation, and a variety of watersports are all just moments from home.

Begin your morning with an invigorating jog along the water's edge, followed by a gourmet breakfast at a nearby café. Spend afternoons unwinding in beautifully landscaped parks or taking a dip in the crystalline community pool. For an active lifestyle, the state-of-the-art fitness centre is ideal for your daily regimen, while the community’s recreational hubs offer abundant opportunities for social engagement and leisure.

The vibrant energy of Dubai Creek Harbour is woven into the fabric of Moor, inviting residents to immerse themselves in a dynamic community atmosphere. Whether your preference is a tranquil day by the pool or a calendar filled with activities, this development caters to every desire. Its thoughtful design ensures that every resident has access to the amenities needed for a rich and fulfilling life, all within the comfort of their own neighbourhood.
palace-beach-residence:
Curated for those with a true taste for the finer things in life, Palace Beach Residence offers residents an affluent lifestyle experience on the shore’s edge with private beach access, world-class amenities and unparalleled views of the city’s skyline.

Whether you envision waking up to the sound of the waves crashing on the 1.5 km of pristine, private beach or prefer to embrace the breathtaking view of the city’s skyline towering above, Palace Beach Residence is strategically positioned between both the Arabian Gulf and Dubai’s iconic skyscrapers, providing stunning panoramic views whichever direction you choose to look.

Residing at Palace Beach Residence may give you the impression that you are a world away as you immerse yourself within your new luxury seaside life. However, its prime location means you are never more than 20 minutes from Dubai’s key landmarks, including Dubai International Airport and Palm Jumeirah.

Standing at the gateway to Dubai’s powerhouse of trade and enterprise, Azizi Lina rises in Downtown Jebel Ali - beside JAFZA, one of the world’s largest free zones, and the Middle East’s biggest port. With unmatched connectivity, direct metro access, and a wealth of premium amenities, it brings the world’s opportunities to your doorstep, seamlessly blending ambition, convenience, and lifestyle.

KEY FEATURES

  • Distinguished freehold studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments
  • Strategic location with some of the best ROIs in the emirate
  • Adjacent to JAFZA, the region’s largest port and one of the world’s biggest free zones
  • 100+ Fortune Global 500 companies in immediate vicinity
  • Direct access to Sheikh Zayed Road
  • Just steps from Life Pharmacy Metro Station
  • High-end finishes and amenities
  • Easy connectivity to prime leisure and retail hubs

casagrand-hermina:
Hermina Casagrand is a prestigious residential development by Casagrand, located on the exclusive Dubai Island in Dubai. Offering first-row sea views, this project features fully furnished 1 to 4 BHK apartments, complete with private pools and jacuzzis, designed for luxury and comfort. Residents will enjoy seamless access with easy entry and exit, complemented by stunning, unobstructed sea vistas. The development boasts a prime location just 5 minutes from Deira, Bur Dubai, and the Gold Souk, 15 minutes to the Financial Centre and Dubai International Airport, and 20 minutes to Downtown Dubai.

Unit options range from spacious 1 BHK apartments (833-946 sq ft), to expansive 3 BHK plus maid’s rooms (1724-2749 sq ft), including exclusive 3 and 4 BHK penthouses. The project offers a flexible 60:40 payment plan, targeting completion in Q1 2028.

Residents will enjoy world-class amenities such as swimming pools, a sky cinema, spa, gym, yoga space, trampoline park, and an observation deck, creating an unparalleled lifestyle by the sea. Hermina truly redefines luxury waterfront living in Dubai.
elevia-residences-2:
A true masterpiece, Elevia Residences blends sleek, modern design with impeccable craftsmanship, creating a home that's both luxurious and built to stand the test of time. Every space is meticulously planned for ultimate comfort, functionality, and efficiency, ensuring long-term investment value. Whether you're a homeowner seeking sophistication or an investor eyeing exceptional return, this is where quality meets opportunity.

ramada-residences:
Ramada Residences by Wyndham in Al Jaddaf embodies an “Architecture of Belonging,” merging luxury with purpose. It balances private comfort and communal warmth through contemporary design, fluid planning, and intentional materials, creating a dynamic, living space where architecture supports clarity and the rhythm of everyday life.

Ramada Residences' structure, rising B+G+P+11+R, is a precise choreography of private and public volumes. The design embraces clean, modern lines and a refined façade language that reflects its dual character: residential serenity and urban sophistication. The podium integrates active zones, while upper floors deliver expansive, thoughtfully configured one and two-bedroom layouts.

At Ramada Residences by Wyndham, homeownership carries privileges that extend far beyond the property. Every unit buyer is entitled to a complimentary one-year Wyndham Rewards Platinum Membership, placing you in a special status tier within one of the world’s most awarded loyalty programs.

Membership grants you global access to 8,300+ hotels across 100+ countries, along with benefits such as complimentary Wi-Fi, preferred room choice, and a dedicated member services line. As a Platinum member, you also enjoy early check-in, late checkout, room upgrades, and accelerated points earning on every stay. Points can be redeemed not only for hotel bookings, but also for flights, car rentals, gift cards, and curated experiences.
mirasol-2:
Mirasol 2 is a contemporary residential development designed to offer a perfect blend of comfort, style, and functionality. Nestled in a prime location, the project features modern architecture with spacious layouts that cater to the needs of families and individuals alike. Each home is thoughtfully crafted to maximize natural light and ventilation, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. High-quality materials and finishes ensure durability and elegance throughout the living spaces.

The community amenities at Mirasol 2 elevate the living experience, including beautifully landscaped gardens, a fully equipped fitness center, swimming pools, and dedicated play areas for children. Safety and security are prioritized with 24/7 surveillance and controlled access, providing residents peace of mind. The development also incorporates sustainable features such as energy-efficient lighting and water-saving fixtures, reflecting a commitment to environmentally responsible living.

Conveniently located, Mirasol 2 offers easy access to schools, shopping centers, healthcare facilities, and major transportation routes. This connectivity makes everyday living effortless and enjoyable. Whether you are seeking a vibrant neighborhood or a tranquil retreat, Mirasol 2 presents a perfect opportunity to own a stylish and comfortable home that meets all your lifestyle needs.
grove-uptown-views:
Grove Views, the residential enclave within Saadiyat Grove, boasts a coveted location surrounded by shopping, dining, and cultural experiences, all within the bustling cultural district. 

From studios to 2-bedroom apartments, these homes offer a seamless connection to the finest in luxurious beauty, urban vibrancy, and the enriching embrace of nature.
palazzo-tissoli:
At Palazzo Tissoli, living is imagined as momentum, moving between private sanctuaries and vibrant spaces, between the serenity of interiors and the energy of community. Palazzo Tissoli rises as an ode to Ras Al Khaimah, inspired by the harmony where desert dunes meet mangrove wetlands and the Hajar Mountains trace the horizon. Flowing terraces, glass façades, and landscaped layers mirror this landscape, creating a dialogue between nature and elegance, and shaping a landmark of cultural authenticity and contemporary vision.

Palazzo Tissoli marks the first Pininfarina designed residences on Al Marjan Island and in Ras Al Khaimah, bringing Italian mastery to one of the UAE’s most dynamic waterfronts.

The development offers a curated mix of 596 fully furnished homes, from contemporary studios to expansive one-bedroom residences. Each residence at Palazzo Tissoli employs refined finishes in stone, wood, and glass to create a timeless palette. Floor-to-ceiling glazing dissolves boundaries between interior and exterior, framing views of the Arabian Gulf and Wynn resort as integral elements of the living experience.

The living spaces feature open layouts, natural textures, and floor-to-ceiling glazing that frames sweeping views of the sea. A palette of stone, wood, and contemporary furnishings extends this sense of openness indoors, shaping sophisticated and modern interiors.

Palazzo Tissoli extends the “Centre of Life” philosophy into every shared space, creating amenities that bring together wellness, leisure, and community in a premium, resort-style setting. From gardens and pools to lounges and dedicated spaces for fitness, work, and family life, each environment is designed to enrich daily living and reflect the character of Italian hospitality.
azure-by-lapis: This is an exciting new development project that is currently in the announcement phase. While detailed information about the project is not yet available, we are eager to share more updates soon. This anticipated project promises to bring unique opportunities and features to its location, aiming to create a dynamic and vibrant environment for residents and visitors alike. RAK Central is set to become a key destination, and we look forward to providing full information shortly to help you learn more about what this innovative project has to offer.
villa-dellarte:
Villa dell’Arte - a boutique private residence with hotel services. Villa dell'Arte is perfectly situated to offer the best of Dubai’s vibrant lifestyle. Just a 15- minute drive away is the Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC), home to some of the world’s most renowned restaurants. Additionally, the property is only a 20-minute drive from Downtown Dubai, Business Bay, and the iconic Dubai Mall, ensuring seamless access to the city’s premier entertainment and business hubs. 

At Villa dell'Arte, architecture and art merge into one visual statement. Inspired by the vivid aesthetic of David Hockney, The Red Bear brings a sense of playfulness, creativity, and color to the skyline. This rooftop sculpture symbolizes the spirit of contemporary elegance — merging artistic expression with architectural form. Echoing Hockney’s celebration of light and emotion, it transforms Villa del Arte into a living canvas of mindful luxury, reflecting the artistic vision of Mr. Eight Development. 

At the rooftop of Villa dell'Arte, residents can unwind in a truly cinematic atmosphere. An open-air rooftop cinema, a cozy barbecue area, and an infinity pool with breathtaking views toward the Marina create the perfect blend of leisure and sophistication. Here, every evening becomes an experience under the stars, above the island, surrounded by the artistry of design and the beauty of the sea.
divine-al-barari:
Divine Al Barari invites you to live differently. Mornings here begin with sunlight gliding through lush green canopies. Evenings gently settle beneath the quiet glow of city lights. In this place, spaces breathe, balconies open onto endless horizons, and pool water shimmers like an invitation to your own private sanctuary. Nestled at the heart of Dubai’s Green Spine, Divine Al Barari is deeply rooted in nature—yet steps away from everything that makes life effortless and comfortable. Dubai is a city in motion: towers soar skyward, roads chart new paths, and ideas flow with the energy of a future-forward metropolis. Yet beneath this dynamism lies a profound understanding of balance—a city that weaves work, leisure, and family life into a harmonious whole. Divine Al Barari is part of this story, offering a way of life where growth and tranquility go hand in hand.

Majan completes this harmony, delivering a true sense of wholeness and connection. Schools are close by. Parks welcome weekend strolls with loved ones. Shopping centers and restaurants make everyday life easy. And a well-connected road network whisks you to Dubai’s iconic landmarks—from Global Village to the Dubai Mall—in just minutes. The neighborhood continues to grow—and those who arrive today gain more than a home. They step into a vibrant, emerging community with a bright future ahead. At Divine Al Barari, spacious residences blend seamlessly with the landscape, creating a serene retreat far from urban bustle. Unobstructed views stretch across Al Barari’s picturesque scenery, filling every day with light and calm. Here, life is about balance: Tranquility paired with convenience. Comfort elevated by resort-style amenities.

Avida Residences - a boutique, holistic, wellness concept project redefining luxury living in Dubai Islands.

Backed by a strong developer track record. Ultra high-end quality & premium finishes throughout. Boutique hospitality-inspired living with only 50 exclusive residences. Incredibly well-crafted layouts designed for functionality and flow. Wellness and longevity amenities to support daily living. Walking distance to Lagoon Crescent East. rise-by-athlon-2:
Rise by Athlon, an apartment community in Dubai comprising eight uniquely themed buildings that offer residents bespoke amenities for health, fitness, and wellbeing.

Developed as part of a joint venture with Dubai Holding, Rise by Athlon addresses customer demand for residences that support active and well-rounded lifestyles with more than 1,200 one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments that prioritise space and functionality. The contemporary architectural designs, reflects a dynamic lifestyle concept that seamlessly integrates holistic wellbeing, creativity and balance into everyday life. Rise by Athlon will offer a diverse mix of wellness, recreation, and community-focused amenities. Residents will enjoy distinctive features such as the Rhythm Room, Mind & Body Library, Recovery Room, Games Room, Golf Simulator, and a dedicated Bike Workshop. They will also have full access to state-of-the-art fitness facilities within the wider Athlon community, including functional training studios, sports courts, rock climbing, wellness spa, meditation areas, and recovery centre.

sera-1:
Step into a world where every day feels like a luxurious getaway. Thoughtfully designed, each space reflects the elegance of resort living reimagined with a contemporary spirit, creating moments and experiences that stay in your memories.

Wrapped in water gardens, tranquil pools, and sunlit promenades, Sera captures the soul of an opulent retreat, where mornings flow into relaxed afternoons by the water and evenings are touched by marina breezes. With refined residences and amenities that elevate leisure into an art form, offering an intimate escape at every turn.

Step into a sun-kissed poolscape surrounded by swaying palms and breathtaking water gardens. Relish the warm sunlight as you lounge or plunge into crystalline waters, immersing yourself in pure relaxation. Every moment here is designed to relax and rejuvenate the mind, body, and soul – an idyllic sanctuary where resort-style elegance meets nature’s calm.

Beyond your private retreat, the vibrant marina awaits just a stroll away. Wander along the lively promenade, savouring waterfront cafés, boutique experiences, and the gentle rhythm of marina life. Here, excitement and serenity coexist effortlessly, offering a lifestyle that balances leisurely indulgence with spontaneous adventure.
elar1s-rise:
ELAR1S Rise is a new residential development by ELAR1S located in Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT). Its architecture blends modern design with organic shapes, offering a sense of balance and comfort. The building features retail units on the ground floor, office spaces, and residential levels arranged for optimal functionality. The 12th floor houses a clubhouse, while the rooftop includes a sky infinity pool with panoramic views.

The project offers studios and 1- to 2-bedroom apartments designed with neutral tones, premium materials, and smart technology. Each residence is equipped with a home automation system and smart locks, allowing residents to control lighting, temperature, and security from their mobile devices.

Amenities include a gym, spa, kids’ areas, swimming pools, prayer rooms, and outdoor lounges. Located within minutes of Dubai’s major destinations — 20 minutes to JBR and Palm Jumeirah, 25 minutes to Mall of the Emirates — JVT provides parks, schools, and shopping centers nearby. ELAR1S Rise combines a strategic location with modern comfort, making it ideal for both living and investment.
palace-residences-hillside:
Palace Residences Hillside is a new branded residential development by Emaar in the prestigious Dubai Hills Estate community. The project blends refined urban architecture with the serene character of “The Green Heart of Dubai.” Its design follows the Palace Hotels aesthetic, offering understated luxury and resort-inspired comfort surrounded by parks, golf greens, and landscaped boulevards.

The development features 359 residences, including elegant 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom apartments and 3-bedroom townhouses. Interiors are styled in soft natural hues of beige, green, and brown, emphasizing open layouts, natural light, and premium materials. Attention to texture and tone creates a warm, sophisticated atmosphere, while panoramic glazing ensures a sense of openness and connection to the surrounding greenery.

Located within Dubai Hills Estate, the project offers access to the Dubai Hills Park, Dubai Hills Golf Club, and Dubai Hills Mall, as well as schools and King’s College Hospital. Residents enjoy a resort-like environment with amenities such as a rooftop deck, infinity pool, outdoor gym, padel and multi-use courts, yoga and BBQ areas, and family zones. Palace Residences Hillside reflects Emaar’s signature vision — combining hospitality-inspired living with contemporary elegance in one of Dubai’s most desirable addresses.
damac-riverside-views-indigo-2:
Introducing Riverside Views Apartments, a luxury residential project located in Dubai with a host of amenities. For Health & Activity, Riverside Views Apartments provides unique features like the Opal Chess Haven, calisthenics stations, wall climbing with refreshing water descents, Zen Spa, essential oil lakes, and even a floating stage for operas and musicals.

The Food & Well-Being offerings include diverse dining experiences at Portofino Restaurant, Island Restaurant, and culinary classes using fresh organic ingredients from hydroponic farms. In terms of Social & Cultural amenities, residents have access to a floating cinema, peace rooms for relaxation, a clubhouse with various facilities like co-working spaces, gyms, outdoor cinemas, and arcade games. There's also an amphitheater for regular events, a adult games zone and a kids adventure land.

This project is strategically located in a prime area with quick and easy access to major landmarks such as EXPO 2020, airports, metro stations, and shopping destinations like Damac Mall and Mall of the Emirates.

hq-by-rove:
HQ by Rove is Dubai’s first Grade A commercial office project with a unique hospitality-inspired concept, developed in partnership with the Rove Hotels brand. The complex is located in Business Bay, right in the heart of the city’s business district. It combines modern office spaces with extensive lifestyle amenities, creating a new level of working environment.

The architecture of the building is designed in a contemporary style with a strong focus on comfort and functionality. The project offers more than 120,000 square feet of lifestyle areas, including spacious lounges, coworking zones, and communal spaces. Each floor accommodates 22 offices with flexible layouts and the possibility of combining units. All spaces are fully fitted and furnished, allowing companies to start operating immediately.

A special emphasis is placed on infrastructure and convenience. HQ by Rove features a vibrant food hall with innovative F&B concepts, corporate concierge services, 21 high-speed elevators, and nearly one thousand parking spaces. This combination makes the development not only a workplace, but also a complete environment for effective business operations and an enhanced urban lifestyle.

The project enjoys a strategic location in Business Bay, adjacent to Downtown Dubai and the Dubai Canal, providing quick access to the city’s main transport routes. This makes HQ by Rove particularly attractive for companies seeking a dynamic business environment and a prestigious address.

The launch begins on September 11 with the collection of expressions of interest, followed by the official launch on September 25. Buyers will benefit from a convenient 50/50 payment plan, with project handover scheduled for the first quarter of 2029.

HQ by Rove sets a new benchmark for commercial real estate in Dubai, offering high-quality office solutions blended with lifestyle amenities, redefining the way workspace is experienced in the city.

breez-by-danube:
Introducing BREEZ by Danube — a new architectural landmark rising in the heart of Dubai Maritime City. This 60-storey residential skyscraper will become the tallest residential building on the waterfront, blending luxury, innovation, and impeccable style of modern urban living.
Situated in a prestigious coastal location, the development offers breathtaking panoramic views of the sea, yachts, and cityscapes. Here, every day begins with a gentle sea breeze and a true sense of freedom.
60 floors — a dominant silhouette on the skyline• Prime waterfront location — a rare blend of urban accessibility and natural tranquility• Over 40 resort-style amenities — from swimming pools and spa zones to fitness centers and outdoor relaxation areas
BREEZ by Danube is more than just a residence. It’s a lifestyle for those who aspire to reach new heights — both literally and metaphorically. Luxurious, fully furnished apartments, thoughtfully designed architecture, and an unprecedented level of service create the perfect environment for living, investing, and inspiration.
Ideally located near key highways, business districts, and entertainment hubs of Dubai — everything you need for a dynamic and balanced life is right at your fingertips.
BREEZ by Danube — rise higher. Because the best is always at the top.

agia-napa-marina:
Its spacious lobby has an undulating sculptural ceiling soaring 12 meters above the floor and is surrounded by an all-glass exterior curtain wall with structural glass mullions. This allows an abundance of natural light to flow in and offers a direct view of the commercial area and Event Centre.

Each of the 95 spacious apartments is uniquely shaped to ensure that all living spaces, including bedrooms, are oriented toward the water and beaches – with modern, open plan designs maximizing the daylight and views. The living rooms have full-height glass doors that open wide to extend the living area out onto the covered veranda. The apartments are ranging from a mix of 1, 2, 3 or 4-bedroom residences, to full-floor penthouse apartments at the top two floors, that feature 360-degree panoramic views. Residents of the three radiused-end apartments enjoy 180-degree views.
pearl-park-residence:
This luxury gated residential development offers an exceptional collection of one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and maisonettes, ideally situated in the heart of the city. Designed for modern living, the development provides stunning views of the Mediterranean coastline and combines convenience with style.

Residents can enjoy a range of premium amenities, including a communal swimming pool, children’s paddling pool, private gym, and beautifully landscaped gardens. The property is adjacent to a green park with playground facilities and is located close to major amenities, entertainment areas, and shopping destinations.

Offering both comfort and sophistication, this development is an ideal choice for those seeking a vibrant urban lifestyle with easy access to the sea.

Samana Imperial Garden is a new residential project located in the Arjan district of Dubai, offering luxurious apartments at a very reasonable price. Imagine a spacious residence that exudes contemporary comfort and style every day. The complex is still under construction, but already offers you a prime location in a vibrant area and first-mover advantage.

The master plan of this complex combines elegance and functionality. Imagine living in a complex where each apartment features a spacious floor plan with first-class features, as well as access to a communal pool and fitness center, perfectly combining relaxation and entertainment, with abundant green spaces and amenities for the whole family.

Thanks to its superb location and thoughtful design, the value of this property is sure to increase significantly as the area develops. As we see growing demand for luxury housing in this area, any investment will yield significant returns.
villa-del-brunello:
Villa del Brunello offers an unparalleled beachfront living experience in the heart of Dubai Islands, perfectly blending prestige, elegance, and timeless sophistication. Located just a 15-minute drive from the Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC) and 20 minutes from Downtown Dubai, Business Bay, and Dubai Mall, residents enjoy seamless access to premier business, entertainment, and dining destinations. chapter-01:
This nine-storey residential development above a podium level presents a thoughtfully designed architectural concept, where each floor serves a distinct purpose. The ground floor features a spacious lobby, a retail showroom, and technical areas, while the first and second floors are fully dedicated to resident parking—ensuring convenience and security.

Community life begins on the third floor, which introduces residential units alongside a lifestyle podium featuring a swimming pool and a dedicated children’s play area. From the fourth to the ninth floor, apartments are meticulously designed with attention to detail, offering maximum comfort, natural light, privacy, and efficient space planning.

This project is designed for urban dwellers who appreciate clean architectural lines, functional living spaces, and a city lifestyle where order and style go hand in hand.
riverton-house:
Riverton House — Where architectural scale defines the height of living. Rising in the heart of Dubai’s new waterfront district, Riverton House by Ellington Properties is a landmark residential tower — a 23-storey statement of modern elegance, elevated on a 4-storey podium. Here, urban sophistication meets cutting-edge architecture, and sweeping lagoon views become an everyday part of life. This is more than a building — it’s a new landmark, quietly confident and unmistakably iconic.

With a bold yet refined vertical rhythm, Riverton House integrates into the cityscape, enhancing the district’s identity without disrupting its harmony. Its silhouette is a study in balance — between scale and subtlety, presence and grace. Inside, luxury takes on a new dimension: ceilings at 3.2 metres create a rare sense of volume and airiness, transforming every residence into a space where architecture serves comfort, and natural light gently highlights the finest materials and clean, precise lines.

Crowning the tower is the Rooftop — an elegant retreat of relaxation and serenity with 360-degree views. Here, at the edge of sky and city, the breathtaking panorama of the lagoon and Dubai’s skyline unfolds. As evening lights blend with shimmering reflections on the water, life slows — allowing you to truly feel your place in this dynamic metropolis. This is where architecture doesn’t just end — it soars.

Interiors are minimalist yet warm, defined by clean lines, natural textures, and floor-to-ceiling glazing. Every detail embodies Ellington’s philosophy: understated luxury, meticulous craftsmanship, and deep respect for scale and quality.

The podium houses a thoughtfully curated lifestyle offering — a modern fitness centre, wellness zones, lounges, and intimate relaxation areas — all designed for those who embrace the energy of the city but still cherish personal space and tranquillity.

Riverton House is an architectural statement. Where height is not just measured in storeys, but in standard of living. Where every element speaks of taste, status, and a refined understanding of contemporary comfort.

Living, reimagined at scale.

Verdan1a 3 is a thoughtfully designed residential building located in Wadi Al Safa 5, within the Dubailand Residence Complex. This mid-rise project comprises a basement, ground floor, ten residential levels, and a rooftop. Inspired by the harmony between nature and modern urban life, the development embraces a philosophy of sustainability, calm, and everyday comfort. The architectural concept focuses on creating a living space that balances functionality with visual appeal, offering a serene lifestyle close to the city yet surrounded by a more tranquil setting.

The project offers a broad range of unit types, including studios, as well as apartments with 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, and 3 bedrooms. All units come partially furnished and include fully equipped kitchens with built-in appliances, dining areas, and porcelain countertops. Bedrooms are equipped with full bed sets — including beds with storage compartments, mattresses, and nightstands — with different layouts tailored to each apartment type. Built-in wardrobes are also included for additional storage and convenience.

Residents of Verdan1a 3 benefit from a wide range of on-site facilities that support both relaxation and active lifestyles. The complex features a large swimming pool, a kids’ pool, pool deck with sun loungers, and dedicated play areas. For wellness and fitness, there are separate gyms and saunas for men and women, as well as a yoga and dance room. house-of-well:
House of WELL: Where Form Gives Birth to Luxury
The façade is the face of a building. House of WELL is conceived as a contemporary monument, where every line, material, and volume carries meaning—not just function, but intention.

Rising above the landscape, it resembles a sculpture carved from light and air. Its appearance emerges from a refined interplay of contrasts: transparent glass, matte metal surfaces, and textured natural stone compose a dynamic yet harmonious silhouette. Balconies, projections, and deep terraces are all meticulously considered to accentuate scale, rhythm, and three-dimensionality.

Details are the language of this building. Vertical fins, gentle curves, and multi-level planes orchestrate a dance of light and shadow, giving the façade a living quality—ever-changing with the dawn, dusk, and seasons. This is more than a residential complex; it is an object in dialogue with its surroundings—the palms, the water, and Dubai’s skyline.

Materials have been chosen with purpose. Natural stone and wood, seamlessly integrated into both structure and landscape, anchor the building with a sense of groundedness—calm, confident, and quietly bold. In every joint—a gesture. On every surface—a story.

Conceived under the “NOUSO WELL” philosophy, the project marries contemporary complexity with timeless elegance. It does not impose itself upon the landscape; instead, it becomes part of it—woven organically into its context rather than dominating it.

This is House of WELL: where every form speaks louder than words.

It also includes a terrace, private storage room and covered parking.
amber-heights:
AMBER HEIGHTS is set to be an exceptional residential development.

With a commitment to luxury and quality, our project offers a total of 10 spacious apartments, each designed to provide residents with the utmost comfort and style.

One of the standout features of AMBER HEIGHTS is its ample parking provision, providing two parking spaces for every apartment, except for our 1-bedroom units, ensuring convenience for residents and their guests.

Furthermore, the common areas of the building will include a stunning swimming pool, a state-of-the-art gym, and a dedicated playroom, all thoughtfully designed to enhance the living experience for our residents.
the-eden:
Veering off the traditional path, Sobha Central holds its innovation in a large urban park on top of its crown jewel - the podium which treats residents to a spectacular view from their homes.

With spaces designed to bring people together, not isolate them. From shared leisure lounges to rooftop retreats, every corner is an invitation to connect, unwind, or simply be.

Business center, fitness spaces, shaded green zones, and everyday essentials flow seamlessly into one another—creating a community that feels alive, balanced, and built for the way people live. Every corner is purposefully placed — from the grand prayer hall to the commercial gym, from boutique retail to the supermarket. Whether it’s an early morning spin, a quick game of football, or a serene moment at the meditation room, your routine flows effortlessly through spaces designed for wellness, connection, and pause.

The Eden rises with a distinct advantage in its connectivity within the Sobha Central cluster. It offers residents unmatched internal access through connected lift lobbies with other towers and in doing so connecting directly to the shopping mall, cinema, gym, grand prayer hall, clinic, supermarket, and more.
south-square:
South Square is a modern residential project by Dubai South Properties, designed at the intersection of nature, comfort, and urban infrastructure. The community offers a serene and wellness-focused environment featuring water ponds, green spaces, wellness trails, and amenities tailored for all generations. Each residence is designed with a focus on light, spaciousness, and minimalism, creating a private and comfortable space for everyday living.

The architecture blends seamlessly with the natural landscape, while interiors feature soft finishes and well-thought-out layouts. The project includes areas for both work and leisure, with dedicated zones for focus, play, and relaxation. With direct access to major highways such as Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, Expo Road, and Emirates Road, the location ensures excellent connectivity. Its proximity to Al Maktoum International Airport, Dubai Logistics City, and Jebel Ali Free Zone makes it especially attractive for both residents and investors.

Residents of South Square enjoy access to fitness zones, children's play areas, walking trails, relaxation spots, as well as on-site retail and service outlets. This project is ideal for those seeking a balanced lifestyle, harmony with nature, and a mindful approach to modern living.
riviera-50:
Riviera 50 by Azizi embodies the perfect fusion of coastal charm and vibrant city living. This contemporary residential project is thoughtfully designed to offer residents a luxurious lifestyle with stunning views of the iconic Dubai skyline. Set in the heart of Meydan, Riviera 50 provides seamless access to key amenities, blending tranquility with urban convenience. Residents can indulge in beachside living, outdoor dining experiences, and exclusive retail outlets within beautifully landscaped surroundings. 

The community features indoor and outdoor playgrounds, premium services such as laundry and car wash, and a wealth of leisure options for all ages. Riviera 50 is ideal for those seeking a harmonious balance between dynamic cosmopolitan living and serene natural beauty, offering an exceptional living experience tailored to support and elevate your lifestyle.
juniper-dark-light:
Embrace modern city living a stylish residential complex in the heart of Limassol. Ideally located with easy access to main roads and amenities, it offers 30 elegant 2 and 3-bedroom apartments across two A-rated, energy-efficient buildings. 

Each unit features expansive verandas and grand sliding doors that welcome natural light. Top-floor apartments include private rooftop gardens, perfect for relaxing or entertaining.

Blending contemporary design with sustainability, it redefines urban elegance and comfort for those seeking a premium lifestyle in a vibrant city setting.

This is a unique residential complex that combines style, comfort, and luxury in the very heart of one of Turkey’s most popular resort cities. Developed by the reliable Elite Group, a company with over 30 years of experience and more than 2,000 completed projects, the residence offers exceptional quality and high investment appeal.

Location

The complex is located in the central area of Oba, just:

  • 400 meters from the Blue Flag beach

  • 50 meters from a public transport stop

  • 100–500 meters from shops, cafes, banks, and shopping centers

  • 7 km from Alanya Castle and 40 km from Gazipaşa Airport

Convenient access to transport infrastructure and city attractions makes the complex an ideal choice for both permanent residence and rental income.

For leisure:
