banya: A newly designed project will be located in one of Limassol’s prime locations. The building’s contemporary design and elegant layout will add beauty to the neighborhood. The building will accommodate luxurious 2- and 3-bedroom apartments with limitless natural light.
celtis:
A residential building designed to blend modernity with timeless sophistication. Located in Limassol’s prime area, it offers convenience and prestige with easy access to main roads and city amenities. It features 12 luxurious 2- and 3-bedroom apartments in a stylish setting that stands the test of time.

Relax and enjoy outdoor living by the communal pool area, surrounded by lush greenery.
akala-residences:
Akala-branded residences are defining the future of personal well-being and combining cutting-edge technology, immersive experiences and refined aesthetics.

Both towers are home to a select community of ultra luxury residences while the ultra-luxury hotel in Tower Two provides high- quality services for all apartments. Bridging these towers, the podium levels comprise Akala’s spa and wellness facilities, including an elite club dedicated to enhancing personal performance and wellbeing.

Akala’s world-class wellness resort allows high-performing professionals to incorporate longevity treatments, biohacking therapies, and recovery programs into their daily routine - without disconnecting from their business commitments.

The twin towers orchestrate a deliberate architectural journey of compression and release, crafting spaces that transition seamlessly from darkness to light, coolness to warmth, and confinement to openness.

While wellness in architecture is a prevalent discussion, Akala’s design philosophy is rooted in the undeniable truth that architecture profoundly impacts our well-being. Incorporating biophilic elements, technological innovations, and fundamentally reimagining architecture as a therapeutic experience, Akala offers respite from Dubai’s frenetic energy, a sanctuary from materialism where thoughtful lighting and careful spatial sequencing converge to recalibrate your physical and emotional state.
acacia-by-fashion-tv:
Acacia by Fashion TV rises gracefully on the coveted shores of Al Marjan Island in Ras Al Khaimah. Designed by the globally renowned Conin International, this architectural gem harmonizes natural elements with refined artistry. From lush landscaped courtyards to panoramic sea views, every space is designed to heighten the senses. This is a sanctuary for those who value elegance, privacy, and a front-row seat to nature’s finest views.

Acacia presents a fashion-forward lifestyle, meticulously crafted for those with a refined eye. Blending the effortless charm of island living with modern sophistication, it redefines elegant living. Each residence is a seamless fusion of style, form, and comfort; A private runway where fashion becomes part of everyday life.

At Acacia, every element has been envisioned to elevate your everyday. The architectural philosophy, crafted by Conin International, celebrates clean lines, natural light, and spatial elegance, creating a living experience that feels both intentional and effortless.

The northeast corner hosts a swimming pool, perched above a premium restaurant and connected by a stunning bridge to the main tower. Above, a state-of-the-art gym awaits, where views of the sea inspire every stretch and stride. To the southwest, a lush landscape unfolds, designed to soothe and mesmerise. Whether you’re gazing at the gardens or soaking in the skyline, Acacia ensures that nature is never out of reach.

Acacia is a universe of its own, where everyday life is infused with leisure, wellness, and elegant indulgence. Each amenity is designed not just to serve a purpose, but to elevate your lifestyle. Whether you're soaking in the sun, sharing a meal under the stars, or watching your little ones play, Acacia wraps every experience in warmth, elegance, and care.

At Acacia by Fashion TV, fashion isn’t just worn—it’s lived. Every corner echoes the elegance of couture, with architecture and interiors curated like a runway collection. From tailored finishes to trend-forward design, this is where high style becomes your daily backdrop.
altura-1-at-waada:
Altura 1 at WAADA are high-rise apartments. Distinctive silhouettes defining Dubai’s new standard of living. Experience everyday elegance in these architectural masterpieces of the Waada community.

  • Panoramic dubai skyline views
  • Premium fixtures and finishes
  • Private terraces
oystra:
Oystra is an ultra-luxury residential project located on Marjan Island in the Emirate of Ras Al Khaimah (UAE). Designed by the iconic architectural firm Zaha Hadid Architects and developed by Richmind Development, Oystra is a unique architectural masterpiece that blends bold design, advanced technologies, and exceptional comfort.

The project comprises four iconic towers offering panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf, Wynn Casino, and pristine beaches. It features a variety of residences ranging from 1- to 3-bedroom units and duplexes to waterfront villas and penthouses. Interiors are crafted by the world-renowned design studio HBA, while over 100,000 sq. ft. of lush landscaping and water features are created by Cracknell.

Oystra offers more than 50 premium amenities, including an exclusive beach club, a luxury spa, a sky restaurant with 360° views, and Ras Al Khaimah’s first infinity-edge panoramic pool. Just two minutes from the region’s first and only casino, the project also represents one of the most promising investment opportunities in the UAE.
vision: Each luxury apartment is set beautifully with breathtaking panoramic city views. Meticulously designed with smart space arrangements that deliver pure comfort and style. Residents will enjoy the opulence of spacious living areas with floor to ceiling windows that allow natural light to flow through the space giving it that sense of freedom. These homes are designed with the best high quality materials and high standards of finish, where premium aesthetics fuse with elevated comforted high spec functionality. Each unique penthouse boasts effortless luxury that is further enhanced by uncompromised panoramic views of the city that will definitely inspire your body, mind and soul. Welcome to a dream come true.
dwtn-residences:
New Residential Complex by Deyaar – Coming Soon to Business Bay.

Introducing a new standard of luxurious living in the heart of Dubai. This exclusive development redefines comfort by combining six unique worlds of premium amenities across over 70,000 sq. ft. 

From a spacious lobby with concierge service, lounge area, and café to cozy family spaces for relaxation and children’s development – every detail here is designed for your comfort. Enjoy a spa complex, state-of-the-art gym, and fitness studio, spend time in stylish event spaces, a private cinema, and a cigar lounge bar. For those who value work and creativity, there are elegant coworking spaces, while the upper floors feature the crown jewel of the complex – an infinity pool and an observation deck with panoramic city views.
manam-pearl:
A sanctuary born of timeless elegance, inspired by the natural pearl. It rises with grace, possesses a rare beauty, and holds a quiet power. Like the pearl, formed in still waters— slowly, delicately, gathering layers of meaning— Manam Pearl is crafted with profound depth and intention. Its beauty isn't loud, it’s a testament to refinement.

At Manam Pearl, every residence unfolds like the interior of a precious pearl—open, luminous, and serene. The journey begins at the ground floor, where a welcoming lobby sets the tone for what lies above. Rising gracefully over 11 residential floors, the tower culminates in a rooftop sanctuary where thoughtfully curated amenities await.

Here, space is defined not by square footage, but by light, air, and a liberating sense of openness. Each detail whispers of quiet sophistication, where purposeful design meets the soul, and luxury feels effortless.

Luxury thrives where your elegant interiors meet the vibrant outdoors. Our design embraces indoor-outdoor living, crafting spaces where boundaries disappear. Expansive windows and thoughtful balconies invite light, air, and a harmonious flow, connecting you to the world outside. Step inside, and discover interiors inspired by the timeless elegance of a pearl. Our material palette mirrors its exquisite luminosity, with reflective surfaces and calming natural tones that evoke understated beauty. Every element, chosen for its rarity and enduring charm, ensures an aesthetic that's not just beautiful, but effortlessly luxurious and timeless. Your home here is a luminous sanctuary, where the essence of the pearl inspires a life lived in harmony, inside and out.
miraggio:
Miraggio by Source of Fate Properties is a luxury residential development located on Al Marjan Island in Ras Al Khaimah. The project is designed as a sculptural masterpiece with cascading terraces and curved balconies that blend into the natural landscape and overlook the Arabian Gulf. The architecture reflects a seamless harmony between modern aesthetics and the tranquil environment, creating a serene atmosphere throughout the development.

The residences in Miraggio offer unique layouts with high-end finishes, including natural materials and spacious terraces that open up to sea views. The interiors are crafted with attention to detail, combining elegance and comfort. Apartments are furnished and feature functional design, large windows, and flowing layouts that enhance the feeling of openness.

Miraggio is situated close to key landmarks such as Wynn Resort (5 minutes by car), Al Hamra Mall, and Ras Al Khaimah International Airport (30 minutes away). Residents have access to premium amenities including an infinity pool, yoga studio, gym, padel court, tropical gardens, kids’ play areas, jogging tracks, and a promenade with serene waterfront features. These elements are designed to promote wellness and relaxation in a refined setting.
chelsea-residences-2:
The six towers of Chelsea Residences by DAMAC are a contemporary, urban reflection of coral reefs, conceptualised to echo the lush vibrancy of underwater life and the very spirit of its eponymous football club.

Escape to paradise at SeaCrest by DAMAC! Enjoy stunning sea views, a private beach, and luxurious amenities like the Infinity Sand Pool, Coral Beach, Aqua-Inspired Gym, Starlit Wellness Centre, and Gourmet Healthy Dining.

The project offers a range of one, two, and three-bedroom apartments that boast modern amenities and stunning 270-degree views.

The prime location of Chelsea Residences offers easy access to key landmarks in Dubai, with proximity to the airport, Downtown Dubai, and private beach access.
rimal-4:
Rimal 4 is an elegant mixed-use development located in the prestigious Dubai Marina district, offering a perfect blend of residential comfort and commercial convenience. 

The tower features contemporary architecture with floor-to-ceiling windows, providing residents with breathtaking views of the marina and the Arabian Gulf. Its prime waterfront location ensures easy access to Sheikh Zayed Road, Dubai Metro, and popular destinations like JBR Walk and Bluewaters Island. 

 The development offers a selection of modern 1 to 3-bedroom apartments with high-end finishes, spacious layouts, and private balconies, alongside premium retail and office spaces on the ground floor. 

Residents enjoy exclusive amenities including a swimming pool, fitness center, landscaped gardens, and 24/7 security with concierge services. With its strategic location near top schools, hospitals, and leisure attractions, Rimal 4 is ideal for families, professionals, and investors seeking a luxurious lifestyle in one of Dubai's most dynamic neighborhoods.
treppan-serenique-residences:
Treppan Serenique Residences at Dubai Islands by Fakhruddin Properties presents a groundbreaking evolution in beachfront luxury living. This stunning development seamlessly blends modern architectural finesse with its natural surroundings, offering residents an elegant yet vibrant lifestyle that fosters deep engagement with the environment. The project is designed to become a landmark, catering to discerning individuals who appreciate more than just a residence; it embodies a unique lifestyle choice.

Showcasing panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf, each residence features sleek glass walls and thoughtful designs that ensure unobstructed connections to nature. Treppan Serenique balances the excitement of urban living with the tranquility of island life, allowing residents to experience the best of both worlds. Morning beach walks and breathtaking sunset views from private terraces enrich daily life.

With a commitment to premium living, the project highlights exceptional design using sustainable materials while offering elite service standards. By owning a residence here, one steps into an exclusive narrative where innovation meets coastal charm, creating unmatched living experiences. Don't miss the opportunity to be part of this unique venture — interest is already surging among potential buyers.
auresta:
Auresta is a new residential project by Tiger Properties, located in the prestigious Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC) area of Dubai. The development offers studios as well as one- and two-bedroom apartments, blending contemporary architecture with elegant interior design. Spacious balconies provide panoramic views of Dubai’s cityscape, creating an atmosphere of comfort and luxury.

The project is equipped with a wide range of premium amenities for comfortable living. Residents can enjoy a modern fitness center, swimming pool, children’s play area, and landscaped terraces for relaxation. Additional conveniences include 24-hour security, concierge services, and dedicated parking spaces. Thanks to its well-thought-out infrastructure, Auresta ensures a high standard of living for its residents.

Its location in JVC offers excellent connectivity, with quick access to key areas of Dubai such as Downtown Dubai, Business Bay, and Dubai Marina. Proximity to major highways, including Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road and Al Khail Road, ensures convenient travel across the city. Moreover, the area features a variety of restaurants, shops, schools, and medical facilities, making it an ideal place for family living and investment.
burj-capital:
The Capital of Business. At the Only Address That Matters.

In a city defined by vision and vertical ambition, a new icon is set to rise. Introducing BURJ Capital — a bold new business landmark by Centurion Group, a developer with over 15 years of proven expertise in delivering exceptional office destinations across Dubai.

Located on Al Marasi in the heart of Business Bay, BURJ Capital redefines what it means to own premium commercial real estate in Dubai. Rising 26 stories, with 5 basement levels, 3 podiums, and an iconic double-height lobby, the tower offers only 243 exclusive offices — each elevated by panoramic views of Burj Khalifa, the Dubai Canal, and a lush urban park that enhances both energy and serenity.

Designed by the globally renowned HKS Architects – Chicago, the minds behind the celebrated Salesforce Tower, BURJ Capital reflects their mastery in creating high-performance, world-class commercial environments for forward-thinking enterprises.

Set apart by 4 dedicated amenity floors and more than 15 curated indoor and outdoor experiences, the tower offers:

• Executive lounges and collaborative zones

• Wellness and fitness facilities

• Elevated green terraces and breakout spaces

• Two panoramic viewing decks

• High-end retail and F&B outlets

• Smart access systems, valet, and secure multi-level parking
lazord-by-lapis-2:
Lazord by Lapis is a premium residential development by Lapis Properties, located in the Majan area, opposite Al Barari, in Dubai. The project features a 12-storey building comprising 304 apartments, including studios as well as one- and two-bedroom units. A distinctive highlight of the complex is the presence of private swimming pools on the balconies of select apartments, offering a unique level of comfort and privacy.

Each apartment is equipped with advanced smart home systems, a fully furnished kitchen with European appliances, and high-quality interior finishes. The residences are designed with an emphasis on spaciousness, natural light, and functionality.

Amenities within the complex include indoor and outdoor fitness centers, a wellness club with a sauna, steam room, and jacuzzi, a jogging track, a children's play area, an open-air cinema, a billiards room, BBQ zones, landscaped green areas, concierge services, and valet parking.

The project enjoys a strategic location near major transportation routes such as Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road and Al Ain Road, providing easy access to Dubai's key attractions, including Global Village, IMG Worlds of Adventure, Dubai Mall, and Burj Khalifa.

Al Hamra Greens is a thoughtfully designed community set within RAK Central, Ras Al Khaimah’s emerging live-and-work corridor, offering the perfect balance of serene green surroundings and urban convenience. Al Hamra Greens seamlessly integrates eco-friendly design, offering sustainable living within lush natural surroundings, promoting a harmonious coexistence with the environment. 32 storeys, with spectacular views across the city and boutique hotel-level private facilities, creating a new benchmark in the rental market. The project encompasses 481 residential units, retail spaces and a basement car park.

When completed, it will be the tallest residential tower, the tallest branded residential tower in Dubai and the tallest residential clock tower in the world.

The building boasts a host of amenities and services to cater to the needs of its residents, including underground parking, a well-equipped gym, three high-speed lifts, swimming pools for both adults and children, 24-hour security with CCTV surveillance, a leisure area and park, steam rooms and saunas, Jacuzzi, and concierge services.

burj-khalifa:
The Burj Khalifa, developed by Dubai-based Emaar Properties PJSC, stands as a 'Vertical City' and 'A Living Wonder,' recognized globally as an icon by the Council on Tall Buildings and Urban Habitat. Towering at an impressive 828 meters with over 160 habitable levels, this architectural marvel seamlessly combines art, engineering, and meticulous craftsmanship. Inaugurated on January 4, 2010, the tower holds numerous world records, including being the tallest man-made structure 1,325 days after construction began in 2004.

Constructed with 330,000 cubic meters of concrete, 39,000 tonnes of steel reinforcement, 103,000 square meters of glass, and 15,500 square meters of embossed stainless steel, the Burj Khalifa took 22 million man-hours to complete. The total built-up area spans 5.67 million square feet, comprising residential and office spaces along with the prestigious Armani Hotel Dubai and Armani Residences.

The tower boasts luxurious amenities such as multiple swimming pools, lounges, health and wellness facilities, and a public observation deck on Level 122 featuring At.mosphere, the world's highest fine dining restaurant. The Armani Hotel Dubai, with its unique dining experiences and exclusive spa and retail offerings, adds to the opulence of the residence.

The observation decks on levels 148, 125, and 124 offer breathtaking views of Dubai and its surroundings. Intricate art pieces by international and Middle Eastern artists grace the interiors, symbolizing global harmony. The Burj Khalifa truly comes to life with residents moving into The Residence and The Corporate Suites.

In addition, special events like the world's highest fireworks display marked the grand inauguration anniversary, captivating a global audience. The Residence in Burj Khalifa comprises 900 luxurious residences designed across levels 19-108, offering a prestigious lifestyle. Exclusive Sky Lobbies on Levels 43, 76, and 123, fitness facilities, and recreational rooms enhance the living experience for the privileged few who call Burj Khalifa home.

arthouse-residences-tower-a-by-aviaan:
Arthouse Residences Tower A at Meydan is the inaugural phase of an expansive residential cluster by Aviaan Real Estate Development, offering a distinctive collection of homes in Dubai. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and contemporary sophistication, this low-rise complex presents a refined architectural facade with a distinctly modern appeal. It combines thoughtfully designed interiors with a curated selection of amenities, creating a dedicated urban retreat away from the city's crowds, nestled within the tranquil and evolving landscapes of Nad Al Sheba 1.

Defined by its striking exterior, this architectural vision reflects a commitment to a forward-looking lifestyle. Through the use of sustainable, high-quality materials and practices, each residence is designed to foster an ideal environment for a well-rounded, self-sufficient lifestyle, prioritizing comfort and everyday convenience.

The interiors feature intelligently planned, spacious, and dynamic layouts, with finished rooms that inspire private and family-focused living.

Set within an open and rapidly developing area, this address is situated near the Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary, between Ras Al Khor and Al Ain Roads. This free zone location provides diverse opportunities for establishing businesses, catering to both local and international investors. The vibrant community is enriched by proximity to major attractions such as the Meydan Racecourse and the Academy Driving Range Golf Course, offering ample leisure and entertainment options. Additionally, residents have access to parks, lush landscapes, cafes, retail outlets, sports courts, wellness facilities, upscale hotels, and restaurants—all contributing to a refined and elevated lifestyle.
al-waleed-ws-1:
Al Waleed W.S at DLRC is a proud development presented by Al Waleed Real Estate, a pristine façade overlapping the modern elegance with premium class apartments. Created with a perfectionist eye, this modern residential masterpiece can be called one of the finest architecture pieces with all the materials selected carefully and the living spaces being presented in perfection. These apartments present spacious interiors, high-ceiling and large windows filling with sufficient natural lighting and creating perfect transparency with the outside environment.

The façade has a self-contained massage suite, which is configured in the way to generate wellness, recreation and neighborhood. There is also a climate-controlled swimming pool and a fully equipped fitness facility that facilitates various physical workout sessions. There is greenery provided by outdoor landscaped gardens and a children friendly environment is provided by possession of a children zone. There are elegant, intimate lounges and a multipurpose hall that can be used during events and parties.

It also allows the residents to avail of high-quality concierge and routine maintenance services so that daily requirements, such as cleaning their homes and making deliveries or booking facilities, become managed easily. High-speed communications at the building level and smart-home systems make every minute at the home more comfortable and convenient as well.

Another important feature is the location at Wadi Al Safa in Dubailand. The development is in the busy, well-connected neighbourhood, which provides a convenient access to key employment localities, shopping areas, food courts and nature parks. There is a great transportation network and major roads in the immediate area, and perfect city connectivity, and there are local cafes, stores, and cultural establishments right in the neighborhood.

muraba-veil:
Situated in the prestigious area of Al Wasl in Jumeirah, Dubai, Muraba Veil is a striking 87-storey residential complex developed by Muraba. This architectural marvel stands tall at a height of 391 meters (1,283 feet), showcasing modern design and luxury living at its finest. The structural foundation includes six basement levels dedicated to parking, offering convenient car storage for residents.

Muraba Veil's prime location provides easy access to various amenities and attractions. Nearby, residents can find reputable schools such as Horizon English School Dubai and JSS Private School LLC, both located within 0.5 kilometers. Moreover, the complex is surrounded by 11 top-rated schools recognized for their exceptional performance, including Horizon English School Dubai and Jumeirah English Speaking School, both boasting an 'Outstanding' government inspection rating.

Inspired by the desert landscape, The Veil exudes a sense of exclusivity and tranquility. It rises elegantly from the dunes, creating a private oasis adorned with verdant vegetation and refreshing water features on each floor. With its strategic location and luxurious amenities, Muraba Veil offers residents a unique living experience that seamlessly blends nature with modern urban living.
cloud-towers:
Cloud Tower at Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT) is the latest residential development by Tiger Properties that offers furnished studios, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments within Dubai. The high-rise residential facades are connected at the podium level with its multi-level parking, office spaces and retail facilities.

With its strategic location at JVT within Dubai, residents can find it easy to navigate the rest of the city without facing any issues. The development provides proximity reach to the major highways as well as public transport facilities, so you can have hassle-free connectivity.

The high-end design architecture of the development brings out the character, whereas the apartments offer you a relaxed and welcoming vibe. The residences are designed in a way to offer residents a personal sanctuary with breathtaking views of the palm and the skylines.

Among the attraction, the towers host multiple lifestyle facilities to offers you a luxury environment with access to everything. The lower level of the facades is interconnected to present you with an enclave of exclusive surroundings with access to multi-level parking, retail area, swimming pool and many such facilities at your service.
